description.hltext_display: La Corée du Sud annonce des exercices militaires sans précédent
description.content:
Soldat sud-coréen à la gare d'Imjingang, près de la zone démilitarisée (DMZ) séparant les deux Etats de la péninsule. L'armée sud-coréenne procèdera à partir de jeudi à des vastes manoeuvres terrestres -en plus des manoeuvres navales déjà initiées en mer Jaune- dont les plus importants exercices à munitions réelles jamais effectués sur son territoire à proximité de la frontière avec la Corée du Nord.

description.hltext_display: Földesi-Szabó László és vádlott-társai ártatlannak tartják magukat
description.author: hvg@hvg.hu
description.content:
Földesi-Szabó László, az Egymásért Egy-Másért-ügy elsőrendű vádlottjaként, az utolsó szó jogán azt mondta: még a gondolata sem merült fel annak, hogy a szabályokat megszegjék. /* hvg.hu - 200x200 A */ - ez derült ki abból, amit szerdán reggel az utolsó szó jogával élve mondtak a Fővárosi Bíróságon. Földesi-Szabó László, aki rendőrfőtisztként dolgozott korábban, az kuratóriumának elnökeként csempészet vádjával került a bíróság elé.
Földesi-Szabó elsőrendű vádlottként, az utolsó szó jogán azt mondta, hosszú éveket töltött a rendőrség keretein belül és a kuratóriumi elnöki tisztségre is fegyveres testületek megbecsült munkatársai kérték őt fel. Tevékenységük során mindig kikérték a jogászok véleményét: úgy fogalmazott: még a gondolata sem merült fel annak, hogy a szabályokat megszegjék.
Az egész büntetőeljárást jogértelmezési vitának érzi, és kijelentette, más lenne az egész ügy megítélése, ha titoktartási kötelezettsége alól felmentenék. A csempészési ügy további hat vádlottja is ártatlanságát hangsúlyozta és meghurcoltatásról, megpróbáltatásról beszélt az utolsó szó jogán. Egyikőjük így fogalmazott: életemben egy szöget sem loptam el. Az ügyben várhatóan szerdán késő délelőtt hirdet ítéletet Kenéz Andrea büntetőtanácsa.

description.hltext_display: 【特首述職】胡錦濤：香港過去一年經濟好轉，改善民生獲各界認同
description.content:
鉅亨網新聞中心 (來源：財華社) 2010-12-22 16:55:02 網友評論 條 我來說兩句
國家主席胡錦濤在北京中南海，聽取行政長官曾蔭權述職，胡錦濤提及香港克服金融危機，改善民生及通過2012年政改方案；而曾蔭權就說感謝中央大力支持，政改方案通過為普選邁出重要一步。
在經濟方面，胡錦濤表示香港在過去一年克服了國際金融危機，所帶來的一些不利條件，經濟形勢進一步好轉，特區政府亦把保障和改善民生放在一個重要位置，得到香港社會各界廣泛認同。
曾蔭權向胡錦濤表示，感謝中央政府大力支持，香港成功應對外圍衝擊，社會整體保持穩定，法治和自由得到保障，民生得到改善。

description.hltext_display: Treating depression and achieving remission
description.content:
Asian Journal of Psychiatry, 12/22/2010
Narasimhan M et al. – Despite all the advances in understanding the biological underpinnings of depression and the extensive armamentarium of antidepressants remission is a difficult goal to achieve. This in turn impacts the social and occupational functioning and the quality of life. There are several hurdles to achieving remission including accuracy of diagnosis, partial response, suboptimization of the medication, and failure to capture residual symptoms. There is an urgent need to implement strategies to achieve remission including destigmatizing mental illness, educating patients, their families, optimizing treatments, exploring novel interventions and addressing residual symptoms.

description.hltext_display: Talleres, flamenco, juegos, música y teatro en la Ciudad de los Niños
description.content:
Foto: EP/AYUNTAMIENTO DE MADRID MADRID, 22 Dic. (EUROPA PRESS) -
La Ciudad de los Niños de Madrid abrirá sus puertas en los Jardines del Descubrimiento de mañana, 23 de diciembre, al 2 de enero con una programación llena de talleres, flamenco, juegos, música y teatros entre otras cosas.
Así, la Carpa albergará, del 23 al 29, el proyecto 'Flamenco Kids', en el que un camaleón daltónico enseñará la teoría de los colores, los pequeños descubrirán la gallardía de un erizo bailarín o aprenderán cómo se las apaña un cangrejo soñador. Todo ello con bulerías, rumbas, alegrías, tangos y tanguillos de banda sonora.
Además, entre el 30 de diciembre y el 2 de enero se celebrará la Ciudad Deseo que, con un aforo de 60 niños por pase y seis pases diarios, propone un crear un circuito con tubos de plástico y una bomba de aire para que una ciudad de casas de cartón funcione con la energía de los sueños.
Justo fuera de la carpa se instalará El Laberinto, una instalación interactiva capaz de transformar el espacio cotidiano en un encuentro lúdico intergeneracional a través de un laberinto transparente de gran formato que plantea desafíos, cruces de caminos y encuentros con múltiples soluciones según qué puertas de enigmas y habilidad se abran.
Así, tras cada puerta habrá un enigma, adivinanza, secuencia lógica, cálculo matemático o pregunta sobre cualquier tema y en cualquier idioma, y sólo la respuesta correcta permitirá continuar. Eso sí: las contestaciones se pueden dar en solitario, con quien uno se encuentre dentro o incluso con la ayuda de los que miran desde fuera.
El laberinto también incluye pruebas de habilidad que retan al ingenio, la coordinación, la destreza, la observación, el equilibrio, la concentración, la agilidad o la precisión, utilizando para ello imanes, fuelles, cañas de pescar, cubos de madera en equilibrio o cuerdas. "Un gran reto para la inteligencia y los sentidos", resume el Consistorio.
El laberinto estará abierto de 17 a 20 horas el día 23, de 11 a 14 horas el24 y el 31, y estará cerrado el 25 de diciembre y el 1 de enero. El resto de las jornadas abrirá de 11 a 14 y de 17 a 20 horas.
CONSTRUCCIONES SONORAS
Por otra parte, los niños podrán disfrutar de una composición poética musical creada por ellos mismos en una instalación compuesta de un camino formado por 3.000 campanas en forma de tubos cuidadosamente ensamblados.
Esta actividad estará disponible de 11 a 14 y de 17 a 20 horas, excepto el 23 de diciembre, cuando sólo abrirá por la tarde, y los días de Nochebuena y Nochevieja, que será por la mañana. En Navidad y Año Nuevo estará cerrado.
Dirigido a los más pequeños, una serie de compañías se han unido en La Feria de lo Diminuto, una iniciativa que incluye cualquier propuesta de pequeño formato y que incluye diferentes funciones en un mismo recinto.
Así, la compañía Ne me Titere Pas presentará 'Perséfone y la granada' en La Roulotte , una obra de títeres para niños de 3 a 8 años; y el pasacalles 'Circumploqui', donde un músico y un payaso presentarán diferentes números en una pista montada en lo alto de un triciclo motorizado.
Por su parte, Titeres 4 Caminos presentará en La Tienda Negra 'Retrota y maderas de vivir', un viaje a los años 70; mientras que Anticiclown ofrecerá en el mismo lugar 'Botones de hotel, las maletas de mi abuelo', con la que se invita a deshacer el contenido de las maletas de Tiberio para que la imaginación de los más pequeños los lleve a lugares insospechados.
'Ne me quitte pas' es la propuesta de El Retrete de Dorian Gray, en La Burbuja Blanca, un espectáculo en el que dos maestros de ceremonias invitarán al público a penetrar en el interior de una misteriosa carpa inflable con forma de iglú que esconde el Teatrillo Mágico.
En cuanto a la iniciativa 'Agua', de Miguel Muñoz, unirá malabares de contacto y magia para hacer poesía visual a través de un tanque lleno de agua donde cada gota cobra vida durante unos minutos. Será en La Burbuja Blanca.
Además, 'Ell guitarrista més petit del mon', de Txo Titelles en La Máquina de Fotos, ofrecerá un espectáculo de títeres de tecla para un espectador; mientras que 'String and Circus' de Jordi Regot presenta unos ingenuos personajes con sus pequeñas historias que se muestran muy de cerca.
ATRACCIONES
La Ciudad de los Niños incluye también varias atracciones instaladas en la misma explanada de los Jardines del Descubrimiento, tales como una balanza antigua para medir a los espectadores en kilos, un libro de visitas con artículos de hace más de 25 años, o un aplaudiómetro.
Además, durante todo el tiempo Marcel, el jefe de pista, entretendrá en el exterior del recinto a quienes tengan que esperar, presentará los espectáculos, explicará a los asistentes dónde tienen que ir y les ayudará en caso de problemas.
LA FERIA DE LOS IMPOSIBLES
Mientras todas estas cosas suceden en los Jardines del Descubrimiento, la programación en el Teatro Fernán Gómez también ofrecerá propuestas interesantes, como La Feria de los Imposibles, que abrirá de 11 a 14 y de 17 a 20 horas, con las excepciones del 23 y 25 de diciembre y 1 de enero, cuando habrá sólo horario de mañana.
Se trata de una propuesta de la compañía Civic Civiac de juegos de participación para disfrutar de un mundo mágico del que disfrutar a través de 25 cajas y objetos misteriosos que incluyen mesas, artilugios de ingenio, inventos, espejos surrealistas, cuadros de doble visión o caleidoscopios, entre otros.
Dada la estética de las cajas, fabricadas de manera artesanal, del vestuario de principios de siglo y de la cuidada música se ha conseguido emular una curiosa barraca de feria para que el público se sumerja en las ferias ambulantes de antaño.
Por su parte, La Casa Incierta presentará El Circo Incierto hasta el 9 de enero en la Sala II del Teatro. Se trata de una función de teatro de objetos y circo de 40 minutos de duración que se inspira en el encuentro poético de un soldado con una artista circense.
Además, 'El circo de la mujer serpiente' ofrecerá la posibilidad de realizar un viaje en el tiempo hacia un pasado reciente en el que carpas y barracones mostraban la constelación de lo insólito.
Así, por el escenario desfilará toda una fauna colorista de personajes rescatados de las ferias ambulantes. El jefe de pista, un payaso loco, guiará a los espectadores por los números, que invitan a reflexionar sobre lo diferente.
CIUDAD DE LOS NIÑOS EN PROXIMIDAD
Por último, La Ciudad de los Niños llevará el espectáculo 'Piratas, corsarios y otros temerarios' a varios distritos de la capital para facilitar el acceso de todos los madrileños a su oferta navideña.
Este espectáculo, en el que dos sanguinarios filibusteros dan con sus huesos en una lista tras una accidentada travesía en barca, llegará a Latina el 3 de enero, a Tetuán el 4, a Ciudad Lineal el 7 de enero y a Villaverde el día 8.

description.hltext_display: Video informe: A nueve años del 19 y 20 de Diciembre de 2001
description.content:
Varias actividades se realizaron en Rosario este año para recordar y renovar la lucha del 19 y 20 de diciembre de 2001. Comenzaron el viernes cuando una "Marcha de bicicletas contra la impunidad" partió hacia Paraná para visitar también Santa Fe, Coronda, Oliveros y Capitán Bermúdez, haciendo murales recordatorios de las víctimas de la masacre. Llegaron a Rosario, parando primero en la carpa que sostienen los trabajadores despedidos de SanCor Rosario, para arribar finalmente al acto que se realizó en la puerta de los Tribunales provinciales. Esa segunda actividad se realizó por la mañana, como todos los años, organizada por familiares de víctimas de 2001, acompañados por organizaciones sociales, culturales y sindicales. Por último, a la tarde una multitdinaria marcha partió de Plaza 25 de Mayo para dirigirse a la San Martín. La movilización, organizada por la Multisectorial Rosario, culminó frente a la sede local del gobierno de la provincia, donde se realizó un acto.

description.hltext_display: 10:16 Elektrik gelmezse stat değişecek
description.content:
Son Dakika Spor
A A+-
3 milyon 735 bin 540 liralık fatura ödenmedi. Beşiktaş-Konya Şeker maçının WOW Spor Tesisleri’ne alınması gündeme geldi.
BEŞİKTAŞ’ın bu akşam cezası nedeniyle Konya Torku Şekerspor ile Antalya Mardan Stadı’nda oynayacağı maç tehlikeye girdi. Azeri asıllı Rus işadamı Telman İsmailov’a ait Kundu’daki Mardan Palace Oteli’nin elektriklerinin faturaların ödenmemesi nedeniyle kesildiği öğrenildi.
Hürriyet Gazetesi'nin haberine göre; Akdeniz Elektrik Dağıtım AŞ (AKEDAŞ), bir süredir tahsil edemediği 3 milyon 735 bin 540 liralık fatura için Mardan Palace Oteli’ne taksitle ödeme olanağı sundu. Ama bu konuda da anlaşma sağlanamlayınca elektrikler kesildi.
Özel izin istenecek
Bu akşamki maçın oynanacağı Mardan Stadı’nın da elektrikleri kesik olduğu için Otel Müdürü Cumhur Özen, yetkililerden özel izin isteyeceklerini söyledi.
Her türlü olumsuzluğa karşı Antalya WOW Spor Tesisleri maç için hazırlanmaya başlandı. Karşılaşmanın Mardan Stadı’nda oynanmaması halinde verilecek izinle WOW Tesisleri’nde oynanması gündemde.

description.hltext_display: Ismét bajban Lindsay Lohan- állítólag megtámadott valakit
description.author: Független Hírügynökség
description.content:
Nyomozás indult Lindsay Lohan ellen Kaliforniában, miután a rendőrség közlése szerint az elvonó kúrán lévő színésznő megtámadta a Betty Ford klinika személyzetének egyik tagját- közölte csütörtökön a BBC.
Nyomozás indult Lindsay Lohan ellen Kaliforniában, miután a rendőrség közlése szerint az elvonó kúrán lévő színésznő megtámadta a Betty Ford klinika személyzetének egyik tagját- közölte csütörtökön a BBC. A brit média közlése szerint az eset tíz nappal ezelőtt történt, és a rendőrség most döntötte el, hogy elindítja a nyomozást. Egyelőre nem tudni, hogy mit tett pontosan Lohan.
A rendőrség szerint telefonhívás alapján mentek ki a Betty Ford klinikára, ahol egy október végi bírói döntés értelmében Lohan drog- és alkoholfüggőségét kezelik. Két hónappal ezelőtt a bíró azt mondta: Lohan megúszhatja a börtönbüntetést, amennyiben a február 25-ére kiírt következő bírósági meghallgatásáig tiszta marad. A feltételek bármilyen megszegéséért 180 napig tartó börtönbüntetést kap.
Az amerikai színésznőt július 6-án ítélte 90 napos börtönre és további 90 napos rehabilitációra a bíróság, amiért megszegte a próbaidőre bocsátás feltételeit egy 2007-es ittas vezetés és droggal kapcsolatos ítélet kapcsán. Lohant azonban 13 nap után szabadon engedték, és egy rehabilitációs klinikára szállították. Ezután azonban megbukott egy bíróság által előírt drogteszten, és szeptember 25-én börtönbe zárták, de 14 órával később, háromszázezer dolláros óvadék ellenében szabadon távozhatott. Majd jött az október végi bíróság döntés az elvonókúráról.
Az amerikai média szerint a mostani incidens akkor történt, amikor Lohan szóváltásba keveredett a személyzet egyik tagjával, miután színésznő az előírtnál később tért vissza kimenőjéről a klinikára. Hírügynökségi jelentések szerint az ügyben eljáró sheriff azt közölte, hogy "az áldozat bűnvádi eljárást akar". A klinika szóvivője pedig azt nyilatkozta, hogy az illetőt elbocsátották, mivel megsértette a páciensekkel kapcsolatos bizalmi szabályt.

description.hltext_display: "La Saladini si fa bellacon i soldi dei poveri"
description.content:
CERNOBBIO - Il sindaco Simona Saladini (Foto by Pozzoni Carlo)
COMO - Parlano di «pubblicità scandalosa» e definiscono «un'indecenza» aver speso «ottomila euro in annunci per pubblicizzare un bando anticrisi». A sferrare l'attacco è Autonomia comasca (il gruppo di maggioranza costituito due mesi fa in consiglio provinciale da 2 assessori e 6 consiglieri) e nel mirino finisce l'assessore ai Servizi sociali della Provincia, Simona Saladini (Pdl). Parole di fuoco quelle degli autonomisti, che non hanno digerito l'intervento della Saladini durante l'assemblea degli eletti del Pdl, andata in scena sabato scorso. L'assessore aveva chiamato in causa proprio il neonato gruppo: «Bisogna capire quale rapporto tenere con chi non è più nel Pdl - aveva detto - e quanta visibilità lasciare. Se si vota fra 3 mesi è un conto, fra un anno e mezzo è un altro». Tradotto: non dare troppi fondi agli assessorati gestiti dagli autonomisti, per non regalare loro visibilità. Durissima la replica: quelle della Saladini «sono parole in assoluta sintonia con il suo modo di intendere la politica, un perfetto specchio di quello che per lei è la massima espressione del ruolo di pubblico amministratore: la visibilità a tutti i costi. Per averne conferma basta citare l'ultima scandalosa pubblicità di un bando pubblico dell'assessorato a cui è delegata, quello al Sociale». L'accusa: «Il bando, rivolto alle famiglie in difficoltà economica, era dotato di 100mila euro e sono pervenute richieste solo per 30mila euro. Ma l'indecenza sta nel fatto che l'assessore Saladini ha speso ben 8mila euro in annunci che pubblicizzavano il bando, annunci nei quali non compariva nemmeno il logo della Provincia bensì, in grande evidenza, la foto dell'assessore. Usare un bando pubblico, per di più nel campo sociale, per farsi promozione personale con tanto di foto, non si era mai visto».

description.hltext_display: 遠東銀發2億美元ECB 總座洪信德：明年獲利成長2位數
description.content: � 東銀(2845-TW)公告將發行不超過美金 2 億元ECB，除了業務拓展，也為了新巴賽爾協定作準備，副總暨發言人周添財表示，該行呆帳已提足，而總經理洪信德更表示，明年獲利目標將成長 2 成。� 東銀 (2845-TW)公告將發行不超過美金 2 億元之海外轉換金融債券(ECB)，除了業務拓展，也為了新巴賽爾協定作準備，副總暨發言人周添財表示，該行呆帳已提足，而總經理洪信德更表示，明年獲利目標將成長 2 位數。 周添財表示，� 東銀昨天董事會決議發行2億美元ECB，發行期間5年期，計畫採公募方式，主要是為了增資擴充股本、拓展業務、為新巴賽爾協定作準備，提升銀行淨值與資本適足率，未來轉換普通股將� � 銀增資後股本約1-2成左右。 周添財進一步指出，34號公� �明年將上路，該行呆帳已提足，12月無增提需求。法人� �估，� 銀今年每股稅後盈餘 (EPS)有1.2元水準，明年更可望成長至1.5元。 � 東銀去年正式轉虧為盈，洪信德表示，該行今年底逾放比將低於0.5%，覆蓋率超過200%，明年獲利會更好，將以 2 位數成長為目標，該行也確立以股票股利為主的股利政策，希望擴大股票股利發放。 � 東銀去年每股配發0.45元股利中，有0.35元股票股利。 洪信德表示，� 東銀不僅金融海嘯未降薪，平常該行都是每年 7 月檢討是否調整薪資，今年該行還提前半年至年初就� 薪，以補足金融海嘯的未� 薪，且平均� 薪5%，� �期明年營運可望更好的基礎下，明年還會再� 薪。

description.hltext_display: 20 de Diciembre: Un día muy particular
description.content:
Desde Duhalde, que en un rictus vengativo lanzó su candidatura precisamente en medio de la conmemoración, hasta Macri, que invitó a los “vecinos” de Lugano para reafirmar su política de asaltar a los ocupantes de un baldío que se hace llamar club, después de la desocupación de un enorme baldío que se hace llamar parque, todo fue una letanía pro represiva hasta el hartazgo.
Mientras, la marcha anunciada, se formaba hacia Plaza de Mayo.
Pero a todo esto, la ubicada en la cresta de la ola represiva, estaba pasando revista a las tropas de ocupación que desde ahora asolarán el conurbano bonaerense: Cristina Fernández de Kirchner, apoyada en una formación representativa de los nada menos que 6000 efectivos de régimen militar que constituyen la Gendarmería, proclamaba sus conceptos blumberistas sin ruborizarse...

description.hltext_display: 10:16 Annesine tecavüz etmek isteyeni öldürdü
description.content:
İsmail AKDUMAN/SAMSUN (DHA)
Samsun'da evlerine gelip annesi, Güller B.'ye tecavüz etmek isteyen komşuları Cemil Karakurt'u tabancayla öldüren 16 yaşındaki F.B. hakim karşısına çıktı Canik İlçesi Gölalan Köyü'nde Ağustos ayından meydana gelen olayda, iddiaya göre eşinin kendisini terk etmesinden 47 yaşındaki Hamit B.'yi sorumlu tutan Cemil Karakurt, aralarında husumet bulunan ailenin evine gitti.Kapıyı açan eşi Güller B.'ye, "Karım senin kocanla ilişkisi yüzünden beni terk etti. Yuvamı yıktınız. Namus meselesi neymiş size göstereceğim" diyerek başka bir odaya doğru sürekleyip tecavüz etmek istedi.Güller B.'nin bağırıp yardım istemesi üzerine uyanan oğlu F.B. komşuları olan Cemil Karakurt'u tabancayla ateş ederek öldürdü. Nöbetçi mahkemeye sevk edilen F.B. tutuklandı.Samsun 2'nci Ağır Ceza Mahkemesi'nde ömür boyu hapis cezası istemiyle dün ilk kez hakim karşısına çıkarılan F.B., babası Hamit ile öldürdüğü Cemil Karakurt'un eşi hakkında köyde dedikodu çıktığını anlatırken şöyle dedi: "Cemil, eşinin kendisini terk etmesinden dolayı babamı suçluyordu."BANA DA KÜFÜR ETTİ" Aramızda husumet vardı. Sabah, annemin çığlık seslerine uyandım. Seslerin geldiği odaya girince Cemil'i annemin elbiselerini çıkarmaya çalışırken gördüm. Annemi bırakmasını istedim. Bana da küfür etti. Ben de ölen amcamdan kalan ruhsatsız tabancayı alarak tekrar odaya döndüm.Annemi bırakmasını tekrarladım. Aldırmayınca 1 el ateş ettim. Annemi bırakıp benim üzerime gelmeye başladı. Korkuyla ateş etmeye devam ettim. Onu öldürmesem anneme tecavüz edecekti.""SENİN KOCAN KARIMI NASIL YAPTIYSA" Duruşmada tanık olarak dinlenen anne Güller B. olay günü eşi ve büyük oğlunun işte olduğunu söyleyerek, "Zil çalınınca kapıyı açtım. Cemil Karakurt, üzerime saldırdı.‘Senin kocam benim karımı nasıl yaptıysa ben de seni yapacağım’ diyerek beni sürekleyerek odaya soktu ve elbiselerimi çıkarmaya başladı. Boğuşurken çığlık atmaya başladım.Bu sırada oğlum geldi. Beni bırakmasını istedi. Bırakmayınca da tabancayla ateş etti. Oğlum onu öldürmeseydi bana tecavüz edecekti" diye konuştu. Dava tanıkların dinlenmesi için ertelendi.

description.hltext_display: 21 december 2010 Nieuwjaarsreceptie gemeente op 3 januari
哈爾濱國家糧食交易中心將于12月24日競價銷售19.1萬噸大豆
description.content: 哈爾濱國家糧食交易中心將於12月24日組織“2010年黑龍江省省級儲備大豆競價銷售交易會”，此次交易共上市2008年黑龍江省產大豆19.1萬噸。哈爾濱國家糧食交易中心將於12月24日組織2010年黑龍江省省級儲備大豆競價銷售交易會，此次交易共上市2008年黑龍江省產大豆19.1萬噸。 據中華油脂網12月22日消息，受黑龍江省儲備糧管理有限公司委托，哈爾濱國家糧食交易中心將於2010年12月24日組織2010年黑龍江省省級儲備大豆競價銷售交易會，此次交易共上市2008年黑龍江省產大豆19.1萬噸。 買受人為省內日� 工能力500噸及以上大豆� 工企業（以省糧食局、省財政廳2009年審� �確認� 工能力為準），買受人所購買的大豆僅限於企業自用，不得轉賣。 (王德軍 編輯) 免責聲明：本文所載資料僅供參考，并不構成投資建議，世華財訊對該資料或使用該資料所導致的結果概不承擔任何責任。若資料與原文有異，概以原文為準。世華財訊資訊中心：editor@shihua.com.cn 電話：010-58022299轉235

description.hltext_display: Oltre tre anni di carcereal rapinatore del centro
description.content:
al rapinatore del centro
L'uomo è stato arrestato dalla polizia (Foto by Pozzoni Carlo)
COMO Tre anni e quattro mesi di detenzione al 53 anni che alla fine dello scorso luglio la polizia arrestò in città, dopo una tentata rapina ai danni della farmacia di Sant'Agostino. Gerolamo Beltrami era accusato di due assalti riusciti, il primo il 10 luglio scorso alla farmacia di via Zezio, la San Martino, e il 21 alla farmacia Lanzetti di via Teresa Ciceri. Ieri mattina, il pubblico ministero Simone Pizzotti aveva addirittura chiesto per Beltrami otto anni di reclusione. Se l'è cavata con meno anche perché non risulta che avesse grossi precedenti penali. Fu fermato in via Grossi poco dopo la tentata, ultima rapina all'ombra della pensilina degli autobus in piazza Matteotti. Quel giorno, il 28 luglio, Beltrami entrò nella farmacia con una siringa in mano. Tutt'altro che intimorito, il farmacista costrinse il rapinatore ad allontanarsi e chiamò il 113.

description.hltext_display: Congress leader Karunakaran on ventilator support
description.content:
THIRUVANANTHAPURAM: The condition of ailing Congress leader K Karunakaran turned critical on Wednesday and he was put on ventilator support at a hospital here.
Karunakaran (93) was hospitalised on December 10 following severe breathing problems. Though his condition was critical in the initial days, he showed improvement last week, hospital sources said.
Opposition leader Oommen Chandy visited Karunakaran at the hospital.

description.hltext_display: Evaluation of carotenoid level in schizophrenic patients using non-invasive measurement
description.content:
Asian Journal of Psychiatry, 12/22/2010
Chow TJ et al. – Free radicals are produced as part of the body immune response triggered by exogenous oxidants. In excess, they impair antioxidant defence system and cause oxidative stress. Antioxidants are hypothesised as antidotes to counteract oxidative stress and improve immune function. Carotenoids serve as a reliable indicator of overall antioxidant level in humans. This study investigated the possible relationship of carotenoid antioxidant levels in schizophrenia. A total of 351 schizophrenic subjects from Hospital Bahagia Ulu Kinta, Malaysia and 247 healthy controls were recruited. Subjects’ skin carotenoid levels were measured using a non–invasive technique, Raman spectroscopy. The results showed significant (P<0.01) reduction of carotenoid level in patient compared to healthy controls, suggesting higher levels of oxidative stress in schizophrenia.

description.hltext_display: 12月22日期指震蕩下跌 主力合約IF1101收盤跌1.46%
description.content: 期指各合約22日震蕩下跌。今日股指小幅高開后震蕩盤整，昨日權重股走強推動股指走出一� �大陽線，但股指仍未脫離前期箱體，表明短期市� �相當謹慎，� 之臨近年末，市� �活躍度也有所下降，午后昨日大幅上漲的房地產板塊集體走低，帶動股指快速下探。期指各合約22日震蕩下跌。今日股指小幅高開后震蕩盤整，昨日權重股走強推動股指走出一� �大陽線，但股指仍未脫離前期箱體，表明短期市� �相當謹慎，� 之臨近年末，市� �活躍度也有所下降，午后昨日大幅上漲的房地產板塊集體走低，帶動股指快速下探。從盤面看，此前多� �利用利好消息再次向上突� �，主力合約IF1101短線向上趨勢基本確立，短期市� �或仍將延續盤整。總體而言，隨著市� �交易氛圍明顯改善，� 上目前權重股的估值處於相對安全邊際，對於后市繼續持樂觀態度。 截至12月22日收盤，主力合約IF1101現� �3,243.6點，跌48.0點或1.46%，最高至3,303.0點，最低至3,211.4點。下月合約IF1102現� �3,279.8點，跌46.4點或1.39%；季月合約IF1103現� �3,310.0點，跌51.6點或1.53%；隔季合約IF1106現� �3,392.0點，跌45.8點或1.33%。 現貨市� �板塊方面，有色金屬板塊走勢較強，豫光金鉛(600531)收盤漲1.57%，中色股份(000758)漲1.85%，江西銅業(600362)漲0.10%。截至12月21日收盤，LME基本金屬幾乎全線上漲，期銅盤中大漲191美元，觸及紀錄高位9392美元/噸，最後� �9365/9370美元/噸，高於20日收盤價9201美元/噸。今日國內商品期貨早盤普漲。 受成品油價� �上調刺激，今日石油板塊盤沖高回落，中國石化(600028)收盤跌0.36%，淮油股份(002207)漲0.26%，廣聚能源(000096)漲3.77%。國家發展和改革委員會21日宣布，自22日零時起將汽油、柴油價� �分別提高每噸310元、300元，相當於90號汽油全國平均零售價每升上調0.23元，0號柴油每升上調0.26元。發改委稱，這次成品油價� �調整有利於保障國內市� �供應，同時抑制不合理消費，促進節能減排和經濟結構調整。分析師表示，油價上調直致石油公司產品價� �的上漲，將直接帶來利潤。從這個角度而言，油價的上漲對石油企業的業績及股價表現，都會形成絕對的支撐作用。此外，原油期貨周二創下兩年結算價新高，受股市走強和市� �對美國經濟的樂觀情緒提振。紐約商交所一月原油期貨合約結算價漲45美分，至2008年10月份以來最高結算價水平每桶89.82美元，漲幅0.5%。ICE布倫特原油期貨合約漲46美分，至每桶93.20美元，漲幅0.5%。紐約商交所原油期貨合約的盤中高點為89.97美元，但未能觸及90美元這一被許多投資者視為重要關口的水平。 開盤 收盤 漲跌 漲跌幅(%) 基差 成交量(手) 持倉量(手)日增倉(手)IF300 3,253.82 3,215.45 -34.06 -1.05 IF1101 3,303.00 3,243.60 -48.00 -1.46 48.0 176,758 22,657 -2,055IF1102 3,341.00 3,279.80 -46.40 -1.39 46.4 2,008 517 +60IF1103 3,379.80 3,310.00 -51.60 -1.53 94.6 3,472 4,604 -161 IF1106 3,450.00 3,392.00 -45.80 -1.33 176.6 435 1,445 -15 (李青 撰稿) 免責聲明：本文所載資料僅供參考，并不構成投資建議，世華財訊對該資料或使用該資料所導致的結果概不承擔任何責任。若資料與原文有異，概以原文為準。世華財訊資訊中心：editor@shihua.com.cn 電話：010-58022299轉235

description.hltext_display: FIFA awarded tax-free in Brazil for World Cup
description.content:
BRASILIA, Dec. 21 (Xinhua) -- Brazilian government published on Tuesday in the official Gazette a law that establishes a series of exemptions from federal taxes for the FIFA to organize the 2014 World Cup and the Confederations Cup in 2013.
The exemption enters into force on Jan. 1, 2011, and is one FIFA's requirements to hold the World Cup in the country.
According to the law, for the preparation of the event, FIFA does not need to collect taxes on imported goods (IPI), the contribution to Social Security Financing (Cofins) on imported goods and services, and the Contribution to the Programs for Social Integration and Heritage Formation of the Public Servant ( PIS-Pasep) on imports.
However, the exemption for equipment and construction of the stadia to be used for training the teams in the World Cup's 12 host cities was not authorized by Brazil's Ministry of Finance.
The ministry said the exemption would allow "undue expansion of tax incentives to stadia with the purpose to offer support, whose characteristics deviate from the aims and the reasons justifying the granting of benefits."
According to Brazil's Ministry of Sports, the country gains with the Cup will be greater than the tax exemption granted to FIFA.
The Ministry states that the collection of taxes due to the economic movement generated by the event will amount to about 9.5 billion dollars, while the exemption is estimated at about 600 million dollars.

description.hltext_display: Blog Web Hosting Comparison And Reviews
description.content:
Web hosts are very essential in web sites. In fact, web sites cannot do without website hosting. After all, it is only by following website hosting that organizations and individuals are allowed to create their own sites and make these sites accessible in the worldwide web. As such, with the increasing number of web sites today, there is also a corresponding increase in the demand for hosting services.
There are unique types of hosting services depending on the needs of a particular web site. Basically, one of the most popular types of hosting is blog website hosting. A blog is actually a web page made of short, regularly updated posts. Blog posts are similar to new pages of a journal. Since blogs are very easy to use, most web site owners prefer having this type of hosting service. Moreover, these cost low and offer an inexpensive option of sharing out a company's name in the internet. In addition, these are easy to update and provide a big prospect to share the company's services with a large number of users. More importantly, there are a number of blog website hosting plans that are very affordable. However, in searching for a blog web host, cost should not be the only consideration. You also need to take important aspects that will help you decide in choosing the best host.
In searching for the best host, you need to make a wide search and compare various features that are offered by unique companies until you discover the most suitable one for your blog. Furthermore, while choosing any company, you need to carefully take the terms and conditions stipulated in the subscription plan and make sure that everything suits you.
Some of the important aspects to take in searching for a blog website hosting company includes ease of use, functionality, good performance, and of course cost. The best blog website hosting sites should offer these features on top of excellent reliability, soaringest uptime, easy blog installation, and most importantly hard cash back guarantee. When you need these considerations established, you can easily compare unique hosting companies from user's reviews, and professional's reviews.
Some of the most popular blog website hosting companies are blue host, Hostmonster, iPage, Fatcow, and justhost.
Blue host offers unlimited amount of space and monthly data transfer and domains. Moreover, blue host is an excellent affordable solution for all those who need a good blogging host solution. One of the most enticing features of this company is the fact that it also tosses $75 in advertising credits to be used at Google and Yahoo. As such, your blog will surely be advertised once it's set up and running. Hostmonster also gives unlimited space, unlimited bandwidth, and unlimited domains. This company does not require any set up fees and the monthly subscription is very affordable at just $5.95 a month. It also offers free advertising credits at Google and Yahoo.On the other hand, iPage offers practically the same features but with 50% off its normal monthly fee which makes it just $3.50 per month with no set up fees as well. Fatcow is best known for its excellent support to its clients. At just $5.50 per month, you surely get nearly half a dozen unlimited features. Finally, justhost also offers unlimited space, bandwidth, and domains with just $3.45 a month.

description.hltext_display: Polícia apresenta sinos roubados de igrejas no interior de SP
description.content:
SÃO PAULO - A Polícia Civil apresentou nesta terça-feira, em Taubaté, a 134 quilômetros de São Paulo, sete sinos que haviam sido furtados de igrejas da região nos últimos dias. Um deles foi encontrado com um morador da cidade, junto com dois castiçais e um oratório.
Os outros seis estavam em dois antiquários: um da Estrada Nova de Tremembé e outro da estrada que liga Taubaté a Campos do Jordão. No primeiro, três sinos foram recebidos em consignação para serem vendidos. Já no segundo, os outros três sinos foram comprados. Nos três casos, os sinos foram entregues por pessoas diferentes.
Dos sinos mostrados, quatro são de igrejas da zona rural de Taubaté, Redenção da Serra e São Luiz do Paraitinga. A origem dos outros três ainda não foi identificada. As peças pesam entre 35 e 50 quilos e um deles é de 1864.

description.hltext_display: "5 Tips When Selecting A Content Management System"
description.content:
Edit Article | Posted: Dec 21, 2010 |Comments: 0 |
Share
If you have previously used a Content Management System (CMS), you may have had a taste of some of the features they offer. A Content Management System is used to organize and facilitate collaborative content creation. This command and control center for your website facilitates updates, application interactivity, ecommerce and tools to assist with sales and business development teams.
We've come up with a list of content management system evaluation tips that will help you stay ahead of the game and take advantage of the ever-evolving CMS arena.
1. Avoid Hidden Monthly Costs
Most proprietary Content Management Systems charge monthly or yearly fees as part of the licensing agreement to use the software for your website. These monthly fees are often in addition to the cost and development of a website. The subscription costs can range from a couple hundred dollars a year to tens of thousands of dollars a month.
Open source software, supported by community and private development offers in most cases access to frameworks that prohibit monthly licensing fee's. The advantages are reduced overall cost, decreased dependency on relying one vendor and long term development support. Recent examples include The White House http://www.whitehouse.gov/ and The Onion http://www.theonion.com/ based on a Drupal framework and Wake Forest University http://www.wfu.edu/ and Atlantic Southeast Airlines http://www.flyasa.com/ on Wordpress.
2. Ensure Third Party Software Support
When deciding on a CMS it's crucial to know what out of box support third party applications provide that tool. With so many software packages available to help companies run their business, today's CMS tools offer cutting edge implementation options with what is known as API's (an API facilitates interaction between different software programs). An example is if your business development team relies on SalesForce www.salesforce.com, then you need to know if the SalesForce API is supported by your CMS. If not, be prepared to allocate additional time, budget and resources ensuring your two systems can talk. Before selecting a CMS browse through the list of supported companies and make sure yours are on the list.
3. Demand Google Friendly Search Engine Visibility
Once your website is live, search engine optimization plays an important part of your companies marketing strategy. Some CMS solutions have basic search engine tools that don't provide more elaborate options when integrating additional meta, keyword and page descriptions. Make sure to look for automatic search engine friendly page descriptions for news updates or blog posts. If video is part of your marketing or support efforts, then search engine friendly video integration is vital (especially for more advanced features like video site maps). A large part of your online success will stem from how your organizations content will be deployed online. Ensure your future is hosted on a proper search engine friendly content management system framework that will enhance your online visibility.
4. Smartphone and iPad Friendly
Are your customers using smartphones like the iPhone or iPads to view your website? Chances are that a percentage of your traffic is coming from mobile users and growing monthly. While many companies offer separate mobile sites and tools, these solutions are usually costly and require development time similar to developing and supporting a small website. With the right CMS you can ensure your users experience is consistent for a mobile user as it is with someone using a web browser from work or home. Make sure to ask if your web experience will be identical browsing on an iPhone or Android smartphones without having to incur additional costs.
5. Stay on Budget with Rapid Development
More than ever corporations and government clients are focused on Return On Investment (ROI) and focusing on managing the design and build process. Within the CMS development community it's a fact certain programming languages are notorious for being under supported and difficult to program for even the most skilled developers. When evaluating a content management system take into account support time and hours required for more sophisticated updates. This is especially true if your website solution is based on proprietary software tools that don't permit changes to its code. Whether your company requires a high quality design or an enterprise level multi-site solution, open-source solutions deliver rapid on budget deployments.
Selecting the right Content Management System will help your organization deliver results and deliver uncompromising, high quality Website Design. Ultimately the right new CMS will help deliver higher conversion rates, and improved customer satisfaction.

description.hltext_display: FCC Adopts New Rules To Protect Web Traffic
description.content:
WASHINGTON -- A divided Federal Communications Commission has approved new rules meant to prohibit broadband companies from interfering with Internet traffic flowing to their customers.
The 3-2 vote Tuesday marks a major victory for FCC Chairman Julius Genachowski, who has spent more than a year trying to craft a compromise.
The FCC's three Democrats voted to pass the rules, while the two Republicans opposed them, arguing that they amount to unnecessary regulation. The new rules are likely to face intense scrutiny on Capitol Hill once Republicans take over the House. Meanwhile, public interest groups decried the regulations as too weak, particularly for wireless systems.
Known as "net neutrality," the rules prohibit phone and cable companies from favoring or discriminating against Internet content and services, such as those from rivals.

description.hltext_display: Koli held guilty in 4th Nithari murder
description.content:
GHAZIABAD: A special CBI court here today held Surinder Koli guilty of rape and murder of 12-year-old Deepali, whose body parts were found in a drain in Nithari in 2006.
Special CBI Judge A K Singh pronounced the verdict against Koli (38) while the quantum of sentence will be given tomorrow.
Deepali's case is the fourth out of a total of 16 cases filed by the CBI in connection with the rape and murder of children and a young woman whose skeletal remains were found in Nithari in 2006.
While Moninder Singh Pander and his domestic help Surinder Koli were held accused in the case initially, the CBI named Koli as the prime accused in the chargesheet, stating there was lack of evidence against Pander.
Koli was awarded death sentence by the special court in May this year for the rape and murder of teenager Rachna.
He has also been held guilty of rape and murder of 14-year-old Rimpa Haldar and 8-year-old Aarti by the special court.
The mother of Deepali, who was missing since June 2006 and whose name was mentioned in the complaint lodged in December that year about the children missing from the area, had identified her daughter through her footwear and the DNA test conducted on her skeletal remains.
A total of 19 cases were filed in connection with the rape and murder of children and a young woman in Nithari in 2006 and the CBI filed chargesheets in 16 cases. Three cases were closed without trial due to lack of evidence.

description.hltext_display: Why SEO is so Important?
description.content: What will SEO do for your site? It is fairly easy to launch a business site these days. All you need is a bit of experience in using the web and some software and coding knowledge so you can create your website right away. Even without the latter, you can still create sites rather quickly using free online tools, site creation software, or web hosting services. The fact that new websites are launching left and right proves just how easy it is. If your looking at building your first business website then you should be aware that there is most likey a high possiblity that there is already competition online and everyday there is a potential of new player coming online. Once you have your website up and running, it's time to hit it with SEO both on and off page, this will give you a competitive edge and you will be able to rank higher in the search engines. Search engine optimization or SEO should not be ignored for these reasons. Leading the Search Engine Race As more business websites go live, search engines will have more indexing to do to ensure that every optimized site that launches gets a slot in the search engine results. As the search results get more crowded, users have to go through more pages just to find the business that is best related to the keywords that they entered. However everyone that knows SEO knows that no one goes past the first couple of pages. If the user find what they are looking for one the first result of the first page for the keyword your business of company is wanting to show up for then they will not leave and look for additional pages and they will never hit your site, and it's becuase of this reason you need to be SEO'ed. Applying SEO early means that you have a chance to get in those top results sooner than the competition. Just take note that "sooner" does not mean days. If your in a competitive market then you will need to spend months and even years working on different competitive markets and keywords, that why it's so important to get a good start. Keyword Discovery It's normal for SEO to take months to obtain a keyword, due to competition and big player being in the market. Optimizing your site with common keywords may not give you a chance because of the high page ranking of competing sites that have been around for so many years. making sure that you have preform the correct keyword reasearch will allow you to see golden keywords that might have a lower search volume, but will be a great buyers keyword. This give you a chance to under cut your competition and obtain a great keyword if you build links quickly. Gets Easy and Effective Over Time SEO has a pretty steep learning curve compared to other business marketing methods but once you have an idea on how this marketing strategy works, you can be very consistent with it especially if you found some good keywords to work with. One of the major challanges that you will face is updating your business site with content. Even thou you have allot of idea in your mind about your new website design, keep in mind seo and the affect it can have on your website and mainly your business. You can get started by letting an online keyword tool analyze your site so you can get some keyword ideas or you can let a professional assist. No matter how competitive the market place is, it's important to remember that SEO is always going to be worth while. Once you hit those top results, traffic should be flowing into your site.

description.hltext_display: VoIP Service - Very Important Details You Should Be Aware Of
description.content:
VoIP (or, Voice over IP) is now extremely popular around the world due to the easy access of computers and the Internet in most countries. When VoIP was first introduced, it was during the days of 28.8 and 36.6K modems. Those days, connections were very slow, and it effected the connection and sound quality.
Today's VoiP audio is crystal clear. When you connect via Skype, or many of the other VoIP services, the person you are talking to on the other end, would never suspect that you weren't calling them on your home phone, or cell phone.
Voice over IP is great for businesses, too. International businesses that used to spend thousands of dollars a month are now spending pennies.
Compared to a normal phone service, VoIP is definitely cheaper. You normally don't have long contracts, and you don't need a fixed phone line.
So, who are some of the major VoIP providers out there?:
Skype
When people think of VoIP, many people first think of Skype. Starting back in 2003, Skype has developed into one of the favorite online VoIP services. Not only do they have a Skype to Skype service, where you can talk with other people who have Skype installed on their computers, but you can also use Skype to regular phones, and cell phones.
Skype also has developed Skype phones. They look like regular phones, but are connected to Skype's VoIP network. All you need is a Wi-Fi connection. You log in, and then you can make calls.
Skype's international calls start at a few cents per minute to many countries around the world. You can also purchase Skype Unlimited service, which allows you to call certain countries for around $5 a month. Or, you can use their Unlimited World subscription and make unlimited land line calls to about 40 countries for about $13 a month. This also includes unlimited cell phone calls to: Thailand, U.S.A., Canada, Hong Kong, Guam, China, Puerto Rico, and Singapore.
SkypeIn numbers are also available for many countries. You pay about $15 for three months, and receive a real phone number that you can use for people to call you. When they dial that number and you're on the computer, or have your Skype phone, Skype will start ringing, and you can answer it on your computer with a pair of headphones. If you are not on the computer, or you are on another call, Skype will automatically forward their call to voice mail.
Internet Calls
Internet Calls offers VoIP calls to nearly any nation in the world. It's even possible to call to land line phones in Most major European countries, and Singapore, Taiwan, Hong Kong, South Korea, Japan, Argentina, Canada and the U.S. for free!
In addition, cell phone calls made to the U.S., Canada and Hong Kong are also free!
However, to get free access, you first have to pay 10 Euros, which is good for 120 days of free service. As long as you only call countries that are on their free list, you are allowed 300 minutes of free calls per week. Calls as low as 1 cent per minute are also possible to other world destination.
All you need is a computer connection (preferably a high speed one), and then you can download the software, and you're ready to go. In addition, if you have a verified phone number, you can place a call through the software and it will ring back your cell phone, or land line, and connect your to your destination. There is a small charge for connection, and you will be charged a small per minute fee, depending on which country you are calling.
On the same site it's possible to use MobileVOIP to download software to your 3G, Wifi and other networks, too. This allows you to make VoIP calls, and this won't add any charges to your cell phone.
Internet Calls also has VoIP-In numbers that you can use to have your friends and family contact you. They work the same as SkypIn numbers.
Both Skype and Internet Calls allow you to send very cheap SMS messages to just about anywhere in the world.
Other VoIP Providers
There are many other Voice over IP companies out there. The majority of them use VoIP phones which have Wi-Fi capabilities. Some of these use adapters that connect with your DSL, or Cable modem, and others have Wi-Fi capabilities.Last but not least, don't forget to check out this ViaTalk review, ViaTalk is a top rated voice over IP service provider.

description.hltext_display: Halálukig rács mögött maradhatnak a legveszélyesebb guantánamói foglyok
description.content:
guantánamo terrorizmus Barack Obama Egyesült Államok
Rendelettervezetet készített a Fehér Ház a terrorcselekmények elkövetéséért fogva tartott, legveszélyesebbnek tartott guantánamói rabok jogállásának szabályozására.
A Fehér Ház előkészítette egy olyan elnöki rendelet vázlatát, amely jogilag szabályozza a legveszélyesebbnek tartott guantánamói foglyok korlátlan idejű fogva tartását, miközben lehetővé teszi számukra elzárásuk jogosságának vitatását - közölte kedden egy washingtoni illetékes.
Olyan rabokról van szó, akiket terrorcselekmények elkövetéséért tartanak fogva a börtöntáborként szolgáló amerikai haditengerészeti támaszponton, és az amerikai kormányzat túl veszélyesnek ítéli szabadon bocsátásukat - mondta a névtelenséget kérő illetékes. A rendelet még nem került Barack Obama elé, így annak alkalmazása még a távoli jövő kérdése.
A rendelet tervezete ugyancsak előírja, hogy azok a fogva tartottak, akik fölött szövetségi bíróságok, illetve katonai bizottságok nem ítélkezhetnek, időszakosan - lehetőleg évente - kérhessék ügyük fölülvizsgálatát.
Guantánamón jelenleg 174 foglyot őriznek. Obama elnök 2009 májusában ígéretet tett arra, hogy 2010 januárjában bezárják a börtöntábort. A kongresszus ellenállása miatt azonban fel kellett adnia ezt a tervét.
Obama 2009. májusi beszédében szükségesnek nevezte, hogy a legveszélyesebbnek ítélt és a biztonságra veszélyt jelentő foglyok esetében alkalmazzák a "meghosszabbított fogva tartást".
A The Washington Post című újság, amely először tett említést az elnöki rendelet tervezetéről, úgy tudja, hogy a washingtoni kormányzat a 174 fogoly közül 48 esetében alkalmazná a "meghosszabbított fogva tartást".
A szenátus egy olyan törvénytervezeten dolgozik, amely elfogadása esetén megakadályozná a guantánamói börtöntábor bezárását és a foglyai elleni köztörvényi bírósági eljárások lefolytatását.

description.hltext_display: Croatian coach brings hope to woeful Chinese soccer
description.content:
BEIJING, Dec. 22 (Xinhua) -- Croatian coach Miroslav Blazevic's confidence to guide China through to the London Olympics was one of the few boosts to Chinese soccer that has witnessed another woeful year.
Blazevic signed a two-year contract with Chinese Football Association (CFA) on Dec 11, vowing to overturn recent poor form and help Chinese men's under-23 team advance to the 2012 Olympic soccer tournament.
The 73-year-old Croatian, who coached his country to third place at the 1998 World Cup, led the Chinese Super League team Shanghai Shenhua to third place this year.
Now, he met a new challenge at his coaching post, which might be the biggest one after the Chinese team suffered bitter defeats at the Guangzhou Asian Games.
Media was merciless in attacking the Olympic side last month, calling it the worst in the country's history as the out-of-shape squad lost to arch-rivals Japan and South Korea in two humiliating three-to-nils.
From the Asian Games, China clearly saw the incompetence of their U-21 side, from which most are to play for next year's London Olympic qualifiers that offer three and a half berths in the Asian zone.
Though taking a tough job, Blazevic is full of confidence.
"China has plenty of talented players. Individually they are almost on the same level with those from Japan and South Korea," he said.
"But they are not well organised and tactically inexperienced. That's what I will try to change. And I really look to make some contributions to Chinese soccer, especially in the ending period of my career."
Blazevic also told FIFA.com in an interview that the potential of Chinese soccer is huge and believed China would become a continental soccer giant.
However, the "potential" wasn't tapped this year as both men's and women's national teams expereinced slumps.
The men's U-20 team failed to advance to the FIFA World Youth Championship in Colombia, which was the third successive absence for China since 2005. Besides, the men's U-16 squad didn't make it to the FIFA U-17 World Cup in Mexico next year.
On women's side, the national team crashed out of the World Cup for the first time after they hadn't make a top-three finish at the Asian Cup. Later at the Asian Games, they failed to grab a medal for the first time and finished fourth.
Chinese soccer, affected by match-fixing, crooked referees, illegal gambling and dwindling youths pools, was in its low in the past few years.
Three former Chinese soccer officials, including former CFA vice president Xie Yalong, were arrested on bribery charges in October. Meanwhile, the investigations into several referees who were accused of taking bribes and match fixing had concluded. Among them, Lu Jun, once titled the "Golden Whistle" , had admitted to his wrongdoing and repeatedly apologized to soccer fans.
Despite facing a troublesome situation, new CFA chief Wei Di showed his determination to get the sport back on the track since taking the position early this year.
"For Chinese soccer, changes won't happen in one day," Wei told Xinhua "It takes time and a lot of efforts."
"The priority is to get more kids back to the soccer field. We have to build the groundwork first and then promote the league and the youth-training system."
"I'm sure Chinese soccer will have a new look in a few years," added Wei, who took over the position from Nan Yong in January. Nan was removed from office for involving in match-fixing and arrested in March.
Under the new boss, Chinese soccer delivered a surprise at the East Asian Championships in February as the men's team, coached by Gao Hongbo, whitewashed South Korea 3-0 in China's first victory over the rival in 32 years in FIFA's Class-A matches.
Gao's side turned to ground passing techniques and adopted the popular 4-2-3-1 formation. They tried not to repeat the old long pass and header strategy and were inspired to follow the world's leading tactics.
The upward side stunned France 1-0 in a friendly in June before the World Cup in South Africa, boosting its confidence to stick to the new strategy.
However, the young team, mainly composed of new blood selected by Gao, still lacked effectiveness in midfield and creativity in scoring.
For the upcoming Asian Cup in Doha next month, China will concentrate more on processes than results.
"No matter win or loss, the team must stick to their style," said Wei Di.

description.hltext_display: Négyszáz tonna aranyat adott el az IMF tavaly ősz óta
description.content:
Pénzügyi helyzetének stabilizálása érdekében az IMF 2009 októbere óta több mint négyszáz tonna aranyat adott el. Az aranytartalék csökkentése mellett az IMF lefaragja kiadásait. A következő három évben 100 millió dollárt takarítanak meg így a tervek szerint.
A Nemzetközi Valutaalap (IMF) bejelentette kedden, hogy befejezte aranykészlete egynyolcadának - 403,3 tonnának - az eladását.
A tagállamok két évvel ezelőtt határozták el, hogy a világszervezet váljon meg készlete egy részétől, és az IMF tavaly októberben kezdte meg a program végrehajtását. Nem közölték, hogy kik voltak az utolsó vevők, és azt sem, hogy a szervezet mekkora nyereségre tett szert.
Az IMF egy korábbi bejelentése szerint 19,5 tonna aranyat értékesített októberben. Akkor azzal a mennyiséggel az idei évre tervezett 191,3 tonnás értékesítésből 148,6 tonnát teljesített. Az IMF az akció kezdetén 3217 tonna arannyal, a világ harmadik legnagyobb készletével rendelkezett.
Dominique Strauss-Kahn, az IMF vezérigazgatója tavaly a bevételi modell reformjának nevezte az aranyeladási programot. A reform célja, hogy szilárd pénzügyi alapra kerüljön a szervezet. Az aranytartalék csökkentése mellett az IMF lefaragja kiadásait, és csökkenti személyi állományát is. A következő három évben 100 millió dollárt takarítanak meg így a tervek szerint.
Az IMF - amely az 1990-es években hitelprogramokat szervezve központi szerepet játszott a válságba került ázsiai és a latin-amerikai gazdaságok megsegítésében - eddig főleg a hitelezésből élt. A 2000-es évek első felében viszont kevesebb krízis volt, ezért az IMF bevételei csökkentek, és megnőtt a deficitje. A 2008-ban kiteljesedett világméretű gazdasági válság kezelése azonban ismét nagy kihívások elé állította a nemzetközi pénzügyi szervezetet.

description.hltext_display: 22/12 05:43 *DJ OIL FUTURES: Nymex Crude Hits $90/Bbl In Electronic Trading [DJ]
Az államfő aláírta a nyugdíjtörvényt
description.content:
A köztársasági elnök aláírta nyugdíjtörvényt, amelyet december 13-án fogadott el az Országgyűlés. A Magyar Közlöny keddi számában közzétett jogszabály értelmében a magán-nyugdíjpénztári tagoknak január 31-ig dönteniük kell, hogy maradnak vagy belépnek az állami rendszerbe.
Az Országgyűlés 250 igen, 58 nem szavazattal, 43 tartózkodás mellett fogadta el a szabályozást, a Fidesz és a KDNP mondott igent, nemmel voksoltak a szocialisták és az LMP-sek, a jobbikos képviselők pedig tartózkodtak. A Ház a törvény sürgős kihirdetését kérte Schmitt Pál köztársasági elnöktől.
A jogszabály szerint az állami rendszerbe visszalépők a befizetett, a hozamgarantált tőke feletti összeget és a pénztártagság ideje alatt befizetett tagdíj-kiegészítés összegét felvehetik vagy önkéntes pénztárba helyezhetik át, de jóváírathatják az állami pillérben egyéni számlán is.
Aki magán-nyugdíjpénztári tag akar maradni, annak erről személyesen, a nyugdíjbiztosítási igazgatási szervnél kell nyilatkoznia január 31-ig. Aki nem nyilatkozik, annak a tagviszonya automatikusan megszűnik március elsején.
A tartósan külföldön foglalkoztatott, tartós külföldi szolgálatot teljesítő vagy külföldi tanulmányokat folytató magán-nyugdíjpénztári tag a magyar külképviseleten is nyilatkozhat február 28-ig, szintén személyesen.
Az állami rendszerbe visszalépők tagi kifizetései - a korábban befizetett tagdíj-kiegészítések és a reálhozam - adómentesen felvehetők lesznek.
Aki továbbra is magán-nyugdíjpénztári tag marad, az a 2011. december 1. után megszerzett, járulékalapot képező jövedelmei után 10 százalék tagdíjat fizet a pénztárnak, és nem lesz számára kötelező, hogy a társadalombiztosítási nyugdíjrendszerbe nyugdíjjárulékot fizessen; ettől az időponttól kezdően nem szerez további szolgálati időt az állami rendszerben, a munkáltató viszont tovább fizeti az állami pillérbe a foglalkoztatott után a 24 százalékos nyugdíj-hozzájárulást.
A törvény létrehozza a Nyugdíjreform és Adósságcsökkentő Alapot, amelynek vagyonát az állami rendszerbe visszalépő magán-nyugdíjpénztári tagok portfóliója adja; a vagyon csak az államadósság csökkentésére, illetve költségvetési befizetésre fordítható.

description.hltext_display: "Vlaamse overheid moet geld vrijmaken voor vertaling Congo-boek"
description.content:
De Vlaamse overheid moet geld vrijmaken om het boek "Congo. Een geschiedenis" van te vertalen. Dat is de oproep van het Vlaams Fonds voor de Letteren (VFL).Het VFL staat al zeven jaar in voor de vertalingen van Vlaams literair werk. Het heeft een jaarlijks budget van 165.000 euro en neemt zowat 50 tot 60 procent van de vertaalkost voor zijn rekening om zo een buitenlandse uitgever over de streep te trekken.
Volgens fondsvoorzitter Jos Geysels en directeur Carlo Van Baelen kost het vertalen van het bekroonde werk van zowaar 25.000 euro per taal. Er werden al vier contracten afgesloten. Er zijn ook nog vijf lopende onderhandelingen. Als die ook met succes afgerond worden, zit het geld van het VFL er al bijna door.
Daarom willen beide heren dat de overheid extra budget uittrekt voor "Congo. Een geschiedenis", naar het voorbeeld van de Nederlandse regering. Die droeg financieel bij aan de vertaling van "In Europa" van Geert Mak in twintig talen.
Het non-fictieboek van wist al de AKO Literatuurprijs en de Libris Geschiedenisprijs in de wacht te slepen.

description.hltext_display: Vijender the star of a 'golden year' in Indian boxing
description.content:
NEW DELHI: It started with an unprecedented gold rush and ended pretty much the same way as Indian boxers scaled new heights and broke new barriers with Olympic hero Vijender Singh once again leading the charge by clinching two gold medals and a bronze in a super successful 2010.
The season began with three gold medals in the South Asian Games in Dhaka in February with Chhote Lal Yadav (57kg), Asian champion Suranjoy Singh (51kg) and Amandeep Singh (48kg) finishing on top.
Just a month later, the boxers landed half a dozen gold medals with a cracker of a performance in front of adoring home fans in the Commonwealth Championships.
Trading punches in front of crowds that generally don't turn up for non-cricket sporting events in India, the sextet of Vijender (75kg), South Asian Games gold medallist Amandeep (49kg), Suranjoy (52kg), Asian silver medallist Jai Bhagwan (60kg), Olympian Dinesh Kumar (81kg) and Paramjeet Samota (+91kg) fetched gold to further enhance the sport's rising profile in the country.
This was Vijender's first gold medal in two years, adding to the aura of the strapping six-footer, who remained the world number one from beginning to the end of 2010 -- his supremacy at the top unchallenged.
The championship, in fact, was just a prelude to a fantastic performance in the Commonwealth Games that were to follow six months later, again in the capital.
In the build-up to the Games, Vijender and Co took went for a month-long trip to Cuba to get battle-hardened in the 'spiritual home of boxing' and the improvement was there to be seen when they finally took the ring in the main-event.
Even as the Commonwealth Games Federation complained of lack of crowds at CWG venues, the dome-shaped Talkatora Stadium was witness to an atmosphere which can only be described as electric in every single session of the boxing competition.
Fans queued up as the likes of Vijender, Suranjoy and Akhil Kumar (56kg) began their gold quest in the biggest sporting event India was hosting since the 1982 Asian Games.
It turned out to be a bitter-sweet campaign in the end with Vijender settling for bronze after a controversial loss in the semifinals and defending champion Akhil signing off without a medal following a quarterfinal defeat.
But Suranjoy, Manoj Kumar (64kg) and Paramjit Samota (+91kg) ensured that Indian boxing pulled off its best-ever performance in the Games history by notching up gold medals.
Besides their golds, four bronze came through Amandeep (49kg), Dilbagh Singh (69kg), Vijender and Jai Bhagwan (60kg) making CWG a memorable event for Indian pugilists.
But Vijender's loss was a massive disappointment as he went down without conceding a single scoring punch when the referee penalised him twice for clinching and holding on to his rival in the semifinal.
However, the poster boy of Indian boxing took the setback on his chin and promised a gold in the Asian Games which took place just a month later. And he delivered the goods at his happy hunting ground, China where the event was held in the city of Guangzhou.
There was skepticism that the boxers, who got just a month to rest and recover after the CWG, would under-perform in the Asiad but all such fears vanished once the competition began as Indian pugilists fetched two yellow metals at the event for the first time after Dingko Singh's gold in 1998.
In the end, the Indian boxers managed a brilliant haul of two gold, three silver and four bronze medals without showing any sign of fatigue.
The only disappointment of the event was Suranjoy settling for bronze after entering the event gunning for an eighth straight international gold. But that apart, the Asiad was an affair to remember for Indian boxing.
The 25-year-old Vijender's was the most dramatic final as he squared off against two-time world champion and old nemesis Abbos Atoev of Uzbekistan with a dislocated thumb. Fighting practically with just one hand, he still managed to blank his rival 0-7 in a completely lop-sided encounter.
Vijender aside, the Games boxing competition threw up a second unexpected gold medallist for India in 18-year-old Vikas Krishan (60kg).
The lanky boxer from Haryana, who incidentally looks up to Vijender for inspiration, was the find of the year along with another teen sensation Shiva Thapa.
The two made India proud at the Youth World Championships in May where Vikas clinched a gold, while Shiva settled for silver after fighting his final bout with a stress fracture in his hand. The duo proved themselves again a couple of months later at the inaugural Youth Olympics in Singapore where Shiva got a silver while Vikas came back with a bronze.
The men and the boys had a consistently good run but in the women's arena it was only 'The Magnificent' M C Mary Kom who made an impression.
The Manipuri mother of two added an unprecedented fifth to her kitty but the rest of the women boxers flopped at the September event, fetching just a bronze to go with Mary Kom's gold.
But women's boxing, in general, got a massive boost when the included it in the 2012 London Games roster. It also made its debut at a multi-sporting event in the Asiad where the Indian women pugilists could only manage a couple of bronze medals through Mary Kom and Kavita Goyat.
The women's below-par show went unnoticed due to the brilliant performance of their male counterparts but they will have to get their act together quickly enough to ensure that their London 2012 debut is a memorable one.
All in all, Indian boxing continued its upward march that began with Vijender's historic bronze in the 2008 Beijing Olympics and the graph should head northwards even next year, which has the men's World Championships and Olympic qualifiers lined up.

description.hltext_display: Trusts with exposure to Portugal struggle
description.author: Lora Coventry
description.content:
Gartmore European and BlackRock New Energy are among those who have performed badly this year, according to Financial Express data. Investment trusts with exposure to Portugal have struggled to beat their sector average returns this year, the latest study from Financial Express reveals.
The data comes in light of a warning from Moodyâs that it may downgrade Portugal's A1 rating on the back of poor growth prospects and high borrowing costs in the country.
The announcement was the latest in a series of Eurozone ratings-jolts from various agencies.
Investment trusts with weightings to Portugal Investment trust Weighting to Portugal
1-yr return
BlackRock Greater Europe IT 3.2 20.78 BlackRock New Energy IT 3 -9.01 Gartmore European Inv Trust 1 6.34 JP Morgan European IT Growth 0.3 11.55 JP Morgan European IT Income 1.5 7.39 Premier Renewable Energy 5.3 -10.58 Charter European Trust plc 5.06 1.21 TR Property Investment Trust 0.2 18.71 Source: Financial Express Analytics
There are eight investment trusts with a weighting to the beleaguered European country; two energy trusts, one property, and the remainder focused on investment in European equities.
While those trusts have generally outperformed the blue chip index for the Eurozone, the Euro Stoxx 50, in the past year, all but two have lost more money than their sector average.
The Thames River Property Investment Trust returned 10 per cent less than its sector average over the past year. It has also been at the centre of a call for a re-merger with the Thames River Property Investment Trust Sigma.
Gartmore European, run by the troubled fund manager, is another disappointing performer; it made 6.3 per cent this year compared to a IT Europe sector average of 6.3 per cent. Charter European Trust was weaker, with a 1.2 per cent return. Meanwhile, the JP Morgan trusts have performed just in line with that sector.
BlackRock New Energy was the second worst performer in its Environmental sector over a year, with Premier Renewable Energy taking last place.
At the other end of the scale, the BlackRock Greater Europe IT is the second best performer in its IT Europe sector over the past year, returning 10.4 per cent to investors compared to 10.4 per cent from the sector.

description.hltext_display: Benitez sacked by Inter
description.content:
MILAN, Dec. 21 (Xinhua) -- Rafa Benitez has been sacked as coach of Inter Miland in the wake of their World Club Cup triumph, local media reported on Tuesday.
After winning the World Club Cup, Benitez told the Inter board to "back" him, or "sack" him, and when asked about Spaniard's statement, club president Massimo Moratti refused to comment at the time, however it now seems he has taken Benitez's advice into consideration.
Sky Sports reported the sacking on Tuesday evening after days of speculation surrounding the future of the former Liverpool manager.
Benitez, who won the Champions League with Liverpool in 2005, reportedly said a few days prior that he didn't know if he had been sacked or not, and he also denied rumours of his sacking on Tuesday morning.

description.hltext_display: Wildcats bounce back from losses
description.content: LObservateurRESERVE East St. John downed Riverside for the second time this season, 5-1, at Riverside Monday. But the Wildcats fell to 0-2 in district play last Thursday, falling 4-1 to Dutchtown.Leroy Noble and Andrew Alexander led the way for ESJ against the Rebels, each scoring a pair of goals. Thaddeus Knight rounded out the ESJ scoring. Beau Gaudet scored Riversides lone goal.ESJ coach Paul Dupuy was pleased with his teams ability to bounce back from its first two losses of the season.He noted Noble as a player who has flashed plenty of potential, and one who saw it come to fruition Monday.He has a lot of ability, said Dupuy. Recently there was a game where he had a lot of chances, took a lot of shots, but just couldnt finish it off. This time, he did. He can do a lot of fancy footwork with the ball, now its a matter of maturing as a player. Hes got a lot of natural ability that helps this team.Dechris Strong scored the Wildcats lone goal against Dutchtown.Its something that caused us to look a our alignments, and were moving DeChris around to get him in better position, to get him more involved said Dupuy.We want to make it tougher for teams to double him.Strongs goal tied the game, but Dutchtown answered and stole the momentum back.They took advantage of that momentum shift, said Dupuy.The Wildcats now stand at 8-2-3 overall, 0-2 in district play.

description.hltext_display: Lady Rebels avenge playoff loss
description.content: LObservateurRiversides girls soccer team secured its signature victory of the season Saturday when it defeated Episcopal of Acadiana, 3-1, in a rematch of their 2009 first round playoff matchup.Episcopal downed the Rebels 7-0 to end their season last February. Whenever a team beats you like they beat us in the playoffs, youre going to come out and play with a chip on your shoulder, said Millet. They pulled together, communicated, and got it done. Im proud of them. Like I always say to them, everyone was pulling on the same rope.Shelby Deslatte led the Rebels with a pair of goals. Chelsie Cupit scored the third.Riverside led 2-0 at halftime. Cupit scored the games first goal on a cross from Deslatte and the Rebels wouldnt trail.Then Shelby got loose and finished it, said Millet.Millet said the win was a major positive over a favored team, and something he feels his players can use to build toward a special season.I really thought wed have to play extremely well to even stay in it, said Millet. But the girls went out and played a great, great game. They came out with energy and outplayed a team thats going to be in the playoffs.Millet said that on the bus ride back to Reserve, he and his team discussed making a push to the next level this season.We have a great opportunity this year, said Millet. Were starting to prove that we can beat people. I think the team we beat (Saturday) is at least as good as those well see in district. So this year, we can see the possibilities. We can create some milestones for ourselves.The Rebels (5-6-1) moved within one game of .500 on Monday by defeating East St. John for the second time this season, 4-2.Deslatte scored a pair of goals. Duhon and Mary Gurley each scored one.The Wildcats trailed 3-0 when they responded with a pair of goals.But Gurley put in a goal with eight minutes left to seal things.Credit to East St. John, they came out in the second half and played a scrappy, physical game, said Millet. But our girls did well to deal with the adversity.

description.hltext_display: Gordon, Nicholas guide Rams over Comets
description.content: LObservateurLAPLACE West St. Johns backcourt caught fire Monday night at St. Charles, as Jaylyn Gordon and Jujuan Nicholas combined to score 51 points in a 65-53 win over the Comets.Gordon scored 31 points and Nicholas 20. Gordon hit four 3-pointers on the night. For St. Charles, Kacie Braud was the high scorer with 23 points, also adding 13 rebounds. Emily Picciola scored 17.The Comets got off to a strong start, leading West St. John 10-4 early before the Rams got into a groove. A Braud short jumper gave St. Charles a 12-8 lead, but a Gordon 3 pulled the Rams within one midway through the first quarter.Braud scored the next two baskets to extend the SCC lead to 16-11.Weve been working a lot on our offensive game, said St. Charles coach Kelly Cupit. We havent been scared to take the shots when theyre there, and if we continue to do that, we should see the improvement continue.But the Rams would end the first quarter on an 11-1 run and would never trail again. Jasmine Young ignited the surge with a basket, then Nicholas scored on back-to-back layups. Gordon scored on a pull up jumper to give WSJ a 19-16 lead. Picciola hit a free throw to make it 19-17, but Nicholas canned a 3 at the other end to make it 22-17.We did some uncharacteristic things early, but we got it together, said West St. John coach Lester Smith. We were taking too many long shots. Once we started going inside , it created some quality chances outside for us.The trend for WSJ continued in the second quarter, however, as Gordon began to take over. Her basket and free throw made it 27-19. Braud answered at the other end off of a pass by Heather Orillion, but Deja Feist pushed the lead back to eight, 29-21, with a bucket off of a feed from Gordon.Passing and cutting, Nicholas said. Were working well as a team and were getting good results.Braud scored again but the Rams scored six straight points on baskets by Nicholas, Feist and Gordon. That made it 35-23. The Rams led 35-25 at halftime.St. Charles wouldnt truly go away. A Braud score at the midpoint of the third made it a 7-point game, 42-35. Another cut the lead to five. A short time later, a Braud offensive rebound led to an Orillion jumper, making it 44-40 in favor of WSJ.But the final 50 seconds of the quarter proved fatal for SCC. Gordon hit a 3-pointer from the wing, then blocked a shot at the other end. The defense led to offense, as West St. John scored on its final possession of the quarter on a Nicholas 3, pushing the lead back to 10.I spoke with the girls before the game and warned them that West St. John has a couple of girls that can heat up fast, said Cupit. We still need to do a better job of containing those kinds of players when they get rolling.St. Charles would get no closer than seven the rest of the way.The teams will rematch Thursday. The Comets and Rams boys teams will also face off.

Weve been working a lot on our offensive game

description.hltext_display: В здании ООН завоняло
description.content:
21.12 18:54 MIGnews.com Заместитель пресс-секретаря ООН Фархан Хак сообщил, что здание ООН, где проходят заседания Совета Безопасности и Генеральной Ассамблеи, было эвакуировано из-за подозрительного запаха.
Другие представители ООН сговорят, что запах был вызван очевидной утечкой газа в подвале.
Временные здания на Северной лужайке комплекса был эвакуирован во вторник, но уже спустя менее получаса сотрудникам и дипломатам было разрешено вернуться на свои рабочие места.
Здание, о котором идет речь, также является постоянной рабочей резиденцией Генерального секретаря Организации Объединенных Наций Пан Ги Муна. РАСПЕЧАТАТЬ Все по теме ООН

description.hltext_display: Bayou Region rallies past River in fourth, 30-21
description.content:
THIBODAUX – For the second straight season, the Bayou Region upended the River Region in the Thibodaux Lions Club Bayou-River football All-Star game, taking a 30-21 victory at Nicholls State.
Thibodaux running back John Johnson led the Bayou Region to the victory, rushing for 108 yards on 18 attempts with a touchdown. Johnson accounted for 52 of his team’s 58 yards on its go-ahead touchdown drive in the fourth quarter. E.D. White’s Bryce Ledet scored the go-ahead touchdown from 2-yards out with 2:54 to play, putting the Bayou ahead 24-21.
Johnson was named MVP of the Bayou team.
West St. John quarterback Mark Wright accounted for three touchdowns and was named MVP of the River Region.
The Bayou region now leads the series, 3-2.
The River Region took a fourth quarter lead, 21-17, when West St. John quarterback Mark Wright scored on a 7-yard touchdown run.
Johnson put the Bayou ahead 7-0 in the second quarter on a 31-yard scoring dash. Vandebilt’s Michael Blanchard helped the Bayou take advantage of a River Region turnover late in the first half, drilling a 30-yard field goal to make it a 10-0 halftime advantage.
That lead held until the waning moments of the third quarter, when Wright connected with D’haquille Williams for a 15-yard touchdown to pull the River within 10-7.
That ignited a furious finish.
The Bayou pushed the lead back to 10 on the ensuing kickoff as Jamal Jupiter of Assumption raced 96 yards for a touchdown to make it 17-7.
Wright connected with St. Charles’ Harley Scioneaux from 13-yards away to cap the River’s next drive, making it 17-14.
Then Alonzo Lewis of St. James would intercept a Bayou pass to set up Wright’s go-ahead rushing score – before Johnson went to work.
Williams hauled in seven receptions for 141 yards.
Lewis intercepted two passes.
East St John’s Andrew Taylor led the River in rushing with 90 yards on 12 carries.
West St. John’s Michael Dede had eight tackles to lead his team.
