description.hltext_display: ADM urges compliance with stipulations of temporary fencing of construction sites
description.content: The Municipality of Abu Dhabi City has called upon building contractors to observe the conditions set for the construction of temporary fencing around construction sites in accordance with the provisions of the Building Code and its Executive Regulation.

description.hltext_display: Analyse Graphique - L'OREAL : Les fêtes s'annoncent bonnes !
description.author: info@lesechos.fr
description.content:
Lengouement acheteur na pas décliné sur la valeur lOréal à la Bourse de Paris. Cette fin dannée sannonce prometteuse au regard des nouvelles acquisitions du groupe aux Etats-Unis et la fin dune période agitée par laffaire Bettencourt. Léventualité de cession à Nestlé aurait depuis été écartée. Par ailleurs, le groupe semble maintenir la cadence après un troisième trimestre favorable qui affichait déjà une croissance organique au-dessus des attentes. Certains analystes comme Aurel BGC visent désormais les 100 euros.
En données hebdomadaires, cest la poursuite dune nouvelle vague dimpulsion haussière que lon observe après le rebond du titre sur sa moyenne mobile à 50 semaines. Les cours se dirigent désormais vers leurs plus hauts historiques de 98.75 EUR.
En données journalières, ces derniers reviennent consolider au-dessus des 85.85 EUR, la moyenne mobile à 50 jours faisant office de zone de soutien. Le titre semble avoir déjà testé ce niveau et milite désormais pour un retour vers sa résistance moyen-terme de 87.45 EUR dans un premier temps, avant de se lancer à lassaut de nouveaux plus hauts annuels.
Dans ce contexte, on pourra se positionner dès à présent à lachat sur le titre avec les 87.45 EUR comme premier objectif, puis 91.34 EUR à plus longue échéance. Les 84.35 EUR feront office de stop de protection.

description.hltext_display: Employers supporting military employees eligible for award
En mükemmel ücretsiz 25 yazılım burada!
description.author: Zeynel A. Öztürk
description.content: İnternet kafanızı karıştırabilecek kadar çok ücretsiz yazılımla dolu. Hangi yazılımın en iyisi olduğunu bilmeniz ise zor. Üstelik işin içinde indirdiğiniz bir yazılımın aslında bir zararlı olduğunu keşfetmek de var.Ama endişelenmenize gerek yok. Bu makalemizde 25 en iyi ücretsiz yazılımı sizler için bir araya getiriyoruz. Eğer hala bu yazılımlara sahip değilseniz kendinize neden olduğunu sorma vakti gelmiş demektir.

description.hltext_display: Family-run Kitchen Kapers is still cooking
description.author: Maria Panaritis
description.content:
With Christmas just days away, the packing room at Kitchen Kapers' Cherry Hill warehouse was loaded last week with wares that workers wrapped for online holiday orders: Cuisinart hand mixers, oil decanters, ice cream scoops, All-Clad saucepans with lids.
In a nook a few feet away, a family of brothers and sons named Kratchman dug into cardboard boxes of newly arrived merchandise. Steeled against an icy draft with coats and jeans, they removed Shantoku knives, one by one, and priced them.
This housewares company has been through a lot of Christmases since it began 35 years ago as a single store opened by the father, now deceased, whom the Kratchman brothers recall fondly with tears.
Bigger chains have come and gone, or even stayed. Considerable kitchen commerce has moved online, and competitors have threatened to knock the Kratchmans out time and again.
But in spite of a recession that spawned many retail bankruptcies, and big corporate players all around (Williams-Sonoma, Macy's, Bed Bath & Beyond), Kitchen Kapers is still cooking. Its recipe for survival seems built around the same ingredient introduced when Harold Kratchman opened a single shop in 1975 by taking out a loan against his house:
Family. "We didn't lay anybody off. We didn't close any stores when the market crashed," said Rick Kratchman, who is a vice president of Kitchen Kapers Inc. "We tightened our belt, but we wanted to make sure our family of employees were OK." The independent retailer has about 150 employees, including those at its 14 area stores and at its headquarters, on Marlkress Road near Route 70 in Cherry Hill.
Rick, 53, is the middle son, sharing the vice president's title with younger brother Ron, 42. Their older brother, Bob, 56, is president.
Rick's son, Brett, 26, and Bob's son, Brian, 23, now work for Kitchen Kapers, too. Ron's children (6, 10, 13) are too young to work, but hang at headquarters with Dad: "They like to come and test out the new cash registers." Harold Kratchman had spent years working for toy-store chains, after closing an unsuccessful general store on Passyunk Avenue in South Philadelphia when he was young. He was a merchant at heart, his sons said, and he couldn't help but notice while he was running mall toy stores that long lines formed at the few housewares stores he saw.
So when he turned 50, Harold opened the first Kitchen Kapers at Echelon Mall in Voorhees - "just as Cuisinart came out," said Bob Kratchman, who was in college and worked the first stores with his dad.
Today, the Echelon store is gone. And in recent years, the business has slowed its new-store openings, sticking with 14 locations for now. The company is focusing on the ever-changing online market, whose comparison-shoppers live across the country.
Making it this far has not been as easy as stirring soup. Retailing is a harsh mistress that requires a lot of work, because disaster is always just around the corner. "Last year, when it snowed the Saturday before Christmas," Ron Kratchman said, "it was a day when you woke and your heart just fell." Just like that, all three brothers were stranded at home with their wives for, in Rick's case, the first time since their wedding. A meteorological meteor strike had knocked them offline at the most important time. But sales rebounded enough the next few days to keep everyone from curling into a ball and crying.
Ron also remembered how, a few years ago, Kitchen Kapers had just signed a lease for a store in North Wales, only to learn that a housewares chain from out of state was opening a store a mile away. It opened, but eventually it closed, and Kitchen Kapers kept going.
Even about 25 years ago, Rick Kratchman recalled, a huge national chain plunked a store in Cherry Hill Mall, home to one of the only two Kitchen Kapers stores open at the time. That retailer, Lechters Inc., soon was a fixture at many malls.
But by 2001, even Lechters had declared bankruptcy and gone out of business, while Kitchen Kapers lived on. "It's not an easy business to be in," said Rick Kratchman. "We work very hard." Before the global economic crisis put an end to binge expansions in retailing, Kitchen Kapers was approached by competing chains to merge with them.
If not, one chain reportedly threatened about five years ago, they'd put Kitchen Kapers out of business by opening stores in this market.
The Kratchmans said no to an offer they described as heavy on stock, light on cash.
Accepting stock would have been risky, especially since control of the business would have resided with others, Rick said: "We wouldn't have been in control." After the Kratchmans refused the offer, they said, that chain, too, went out of busin

description.hltext_display: Why blame Arundhati for supporting Kashmiri people: Writer
description.content:
Bangalore: Responding to Karnataka Governor H R Bhardwaj's letters, Chief Minister B S Yeddyurappa today defended himself against land scam allegations, saying he had not indulged in any irregularities in denotification of land.
In a tersely worded communication, Mr. Yeddyurappa said denotification of land had also taken place during the regime of JDS leader H D Kumaraswamy and even then there were reports of irregularities, Chief Minister's Office sources said.
On December 15, the Governor had shot off two letters to the Chief Minister asking him to send a detailed report on the land scams allegedly involving his family members and also what action had been taken to stop illegal mining, with specific reference to the Reddy brothers, ministers and mining magnates Janardhana and Karunakara.
Mr. Yeddyurappa, in his response, has stated in a veiled manner that the Governor's missive had been based on Mr. Kumaraswamy's complaint and that his actions were prompted by the latter, the sources said.
The sources said Mr. Yeddyurappa also clarified that the land allotted to his son and daughter had been returned.
On the issue of allotment of 'G' category site using discretionary powers, Mr. Yeddyurappa said he would follow the recent High Court order and stop such allotment, sources said.
In response to another letter by Mr. Bhardwaj seeking clarification on the business interests of the three Bellary ministers, the Reddy brothers and their close associate, Sreeramulu, he defended them saying their transactions are in accordance with the law, sources said.
Mr. Yeddyurappa also informed the Governor that the three ministers did not own any mining licence in Karnataka, sources said.
The Governor had hit out at Mr. Yeddyurappa for failing to take any action over the land scam and mining controversies and had directed him to respond to his letters quickly.
Mr. Yeddyurappa said in his letter that his government has issued several circulars and notifications to curb illegal mining and these measures were even challenged by some aggrieved mines owners.
“We are sure if proper cooperation and support is extended by the Government of India for the measures suggested by the State government, it will go a long way in curbing illegal mining and increase revenue to the state”, the Chief Minister said.
Mr. Yeddyurappa urged Mr. Bhardwaj to join hands with the State government in its effort to curb illegal mining and ask the Centre also to ban export of iron ore.
On Governor's references to three Bellary Ministers, Mr. Yeddyurappa said, “The ministers have nothing to do with the business of the government and it pertained to their individual business activity. However, a copy of your letter has been forwarded to the concerned ministers.”
Mr. Yeddyurappa further said, “It is clarified that the ministers referred to in your letter do not have any subsisting contract with government. I request you to kindly refer to my earlier detailed replies sent on July 13 and today and the same may be perused to avoid any repetition”.
In the letter, Mr. Yeddyurappa further said that the allegations levelled by the Karnataka Pradesh Congress Committee in its representation are “politically motivated“.
He said that to probe allegations regarding land denotification and the allotments, an Inquiry Commission is constituted and Justice B Padmaraj has been appointed.
“I equally share the concern exhibited by you in the letter about the propriety and probity required to be maintained in the administration of the State,” he said in reference to the Governor's letter on illegal mining and with reference to the Bellary ministers.
“The matters referred to in the newspaper report about the ministers have nothing to do with the business of the Government and pertain to individual business activities,” he said, adding that the Governor's letters had been forwarded to the ministers concerned.
He countered the governor's point about lack of action on illegal mining and said the “government had issued various instructions and circulars to curb illegal mining activities in the State“.
He also said that the State's action had in fact prompted several mining companies from approaching the High court on the matter.
He urged the Governor to pursue with the central government to join the State in its efforts to curb illegal mining to ban export of iron ore so as “to promote development of industries leading to value addition and employment generation within the country.”
The Chief Minister also requested the JDS President Deve Gowda, who had petitioned the Governor (about illegal mining and alleged land scams), to “use his good offices to prevail upon the Government of India” to pursue the matter.

description.hltext_display: Alumna's estate donates $2.5 million to WSU
Sismo de 7,4 genera alerta de tsunami
description.content:
El aviso de maremoto declarado en las islas japonesas de Ogasawara, al sur de Japón, tras un sismo de magnitud 7,4 en el océano Pacífico, fue rebajada al nivel de “simple advertencia” ya que las olas no superaron los 50 cm, según la Agencia Meteorológica japonesa.
El temblor ocurrió a una profundidad de 14,9 km y sacudió la región de las islas Bonin. Hasta el cierre de esta edición no se habían reportado víctimas ni daños.
En Chile otro temblor, pero de 4,5 grados de magnitud, sacudió ayer las regiones del Maule y O’Higgins, sin ocasionar víctimas o daños visibles, informaron las autoridades.El aviso de maremoto declarado en las islas japonesas de Ogasawara, al sur de Japón, tras un sismo de magnitud 7,4 en el océano Pacífico, fue rebajada al nivel de "simple advertencia".

description.hltext_display: BP Renews Work At Azerbaijan's Chirag Platform
description.content:
BP, which operates the development of the Azeri-Chirag-Guneshli field, has renewed the production of light crude in Azerbaijan's section of the Caspian Sea, Trend reports.
Work on the platform was stopped for maintenance work on December 11, but has now been restarted in full producing 98,000 barrels a day.
The Baku-Supsa crude pipeline was also stopped at the same time.
Other platforms, specifically at the Azeri field and the deepwater Guneshli field, and the Sangachaksliy oil terminal are continuing to operate.
Participants in the Azeri-Chirag-Guneshli include BP (the operator with a 37.43 percent stake), Chevron (11.27 precent), SOCAR (10 precent), INPEX (10.96 precent), Statoil (8.56 precent), Exxon (8 precent), TPAO (6.75 precent), Itochu (4.3 precent), and Hess (2.72 precent).

description.hltext_display: Analyse Graphique - EIFFAGE : Du nouveau dans la direction du groupe
description.author: info@lesechos.fr
description.content:
Le Groupe Eiffage a mis en place une procédure de succession de son dirigeant Jean-François Roverato. Il sagit en fait de scinder la fonction de président et de directeur général qui sera occupé à partir du second semestre 2011 par Pierre Berger. Le PDG actuel Jean-François Roverato occupera les fonctions de président non exécutif.
La tendance hebdomadaire de la valeur Eiffage est clairement baissière, les cours évoluant au-dessous de la moyenne mobile 20 périodes depuis de nombreuses semaines. Le niveau des 33.56 EUR fait office de solide support long terme : approché récemment par le titre, il a permis dinitier un rebond technique en direction des moyennes mobiles.
En données journalières, la valeur se reprend depuis ses plus bas de la fin Novembre au-dessus de 32 EUR. Ce mouvement a ainsi permis de franchir le niveau symbolique des 34.765 EUR qui devrait jouer le rôle de plancher bas à court terme On pourra suivre le comportement à lapproche de la moyenne 50 jours dont le franchissement devrait relancer lélan haussier sur la valeur.
On pourra ainsi se positionner acheteur dès maintenant avec pour premier objectif les 37 EUR puis les 40 EUR à moyen terme. Il faudra protéger son risque en plaçant son stop de protection sur les 34.50 EUR.

description.hltext_display: Rare lunar eclipse occurs on winter solstice
description.author: Peter Rakobowchuk, AP
description.content:
MONTREAL - The moon took on a deep red and brownish hue early Tuesday as its normal brilliance was obscured by a total lunar eclipse.
It occurred on the same night as the winter solstice, which doesn't happen very often. NASA says the last time the two events coincided was in 1638 — 372 years ago.
A deep reddish shadow began to creep across the moon at about 1:33 a.m. EST and it was completely covered less than two hours later.
Andrew Scott, who works at the King Edward Hotel in downtown Toronto, said he'd been checking out the lunar eclipse all night.
"It looked really cool," he said.
Calgarians were expected to enjoy the best viewing for the eclipse on the same day as the winter solstice without having to worry about cloud cover.
However, the view was obscured by a thin cloud cover, said Muhammad Khan, a clerk at a Petro-Canada station in Calgary.
He said the sky was "quite cloudy" when he ducked out for a cigarette and to check out the eclipse at about 3 a.m. EST.
"It was like a normal colour, but right now, it's covered by a haze," he told The Canadian Press from the gas station in the city's northeast.
A worker at the Calgary airport, who didn't want his name used, also said it was cloudy when he gazed up to the sky and he "didn't see anything."
It was much the same in Montreal, where veteran skygazer Andrew Fazekas said his view was mostly blocked by clouds.
"I had a thick cloud deck to deal with, but even with the cloud, I was able to see the first part of the eclipse," he told The Canadian Press.
Fazekas, 41, an astronomy correspondent for The Weather Network and National Geographic, who also operates a website called thenightskyguy.com, said the early stages of the eclipse that he did see were "quite eerie."
"You could still see the moon being slowly, slowly eaten away by the Earth's shadow," he said.
Fazekas spent most of the night communicating with followers of his Facebook page and said many people were excited by the rare eclipse-solstice coincidence.
"People love to hear what other people are seeing (and) are really keen on hearing observational reports from people who do have clear skies."
"What's really interesting is that some people are obviously holding lunar eclipse parties in different parts of North America," he said.
Fazekas added it was "neat to be able to host a virtual eclipse party" on his Facebook page.
"The fact that I was kind of clouded out for a big part of the event, I still was able to vicariously enjoy the event by hearing other people's experiences."
The president of the Royal Astronomical Society of Canada thought she'd be out of luck in getting a chance to see the rare cosmic experience.
Mary Lou Whitehorne said the eclipse was expected to be visible across Canada, but said it would depend on the weather in each region.
"Here in Halifax, we've got a storm coming so we are not going to see it," she said in an interview from Nova Scotia on Monday.
Whitehorne said that during the eclipse, the moon would adopt an orangey-red or brick-red colour because of the Earth's atmosphere.
"That atmosphere is generally transparent to optical light, but it acts like a lens or a prism," she explained.
"So what it does is it bends the sunlight and it bends...the longer red wavelengths of light and throws a bit of that red light into the Earth's shadow."
A scientist from the University of Western Ontario also said he expected the view to be better at this time of year than during the summer.
"A lot of the atmospheric (pollution) — aerosols and things — will be lower in the winter, so it might be a clearer view," Gordon Osinski said in an interview.
"Often it's only a third of the globe that ever gets to see one of these because it has to be night when you're going to view it."
Whitehorne says the next total lunar eclipse to be visible in Canada will occur on Dec. 10, 2011.
"You can have as many as five lunar eclipses a year in Canada," she said.
"Generally it's two that are nicely visible."

the next total lunar eclipse to be visible in Canada will occur on Dec. 10, 2011.
You could still see the moon being slowly, slowly eaten away by the Earth's shadow
You can have as many as five lunar eclipses a year in Canada
he'd been checking out the lunar eclipse all night.
That atmosphere is generally transparent to optical light, but it acts like a lens or a prism
neat to be able to host a virtual eclipse party
the eclipse was expected to be visible across Canada, but said it would depend on the weather in each region.

description.content:
모바일 보안 서비스 부문에서 세계 최고의 기업인 NetQin Mobile Inc.가 크리스마스용 모바일 애플리케이션을 출시한다고 오늘 발표했다. 그 중 하나가 바로 안드로이드용 NetQin Mobile Anti-virus 4.2 Beta이다. 이 제품은 새로운 기능으로 업데이트되었다. 크리스마스 주제가 삽입된 NetQin의 크리스마스 에디션 제품들은 크리스마스에 사용자들에게 보안감을 제공하는 동시에 크리스마스 분위기를 내고자 제작되었다.
(로고: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20100215/CNM002LOGO)
안드로이드용 NetQin Mobile Anti-virus 4.2 Beta는 도난방지 기능에서 장치를 추적할 수 있는 최신 기술로 업데이트되었다. 개선된 이 장치 위치 추적 소프트웨어는 장치 GPS가 가동하지 않아도 CDMA 장치를 정확하게 추적할 수 있다. 특히 이 제품은 좀 더 정확하게 장치 위치를 추적하는 동시에 배터리 수명도 늘린다.
이 개선된 새 애플리케이션은 또한 더욱 향상되고 단순화된 사용자 인터페이스와 더욱 통합된 사용자 지침을 제공함으로써 사용자 상호작용을 개선시킨다. 더불어 실시간 모니터링 과정 및 원격 조정 기능도 최적화되었다. 이 애플리케이션은 그 어느 때보다 최고의 효율성을 자랑하며, 애플리케이션 풋프린트가 작아서 장치의 배터리 수명에 미치는 영향을 최소화한다. 이와 같은 개선된 성능들 덕분에 이 애플리케이션의 사용자 친화성이 전반적으로 훨씬 더 좋아졌다.
이와 같은 크리스마스 에디션은 안드로이드 시스템에서는 NetQin Mobile Manager와 NetQin Mobile Guard에서, 그리고 심비안 시스템에서는 NetQin Mobile Anti-virus에서 구할 수 있다. NetQin은 또한 곧 다가올 크리스마스를 맞아, 보안 문제 없이 안전하게 크리스마스를 보낼 수 있도록, 사용자들에게 모든 시스템과 바이러스 데이터베이스를 업데이트할 것을 권장한다.
크리스마스 에디션 NetQin 제품은 http://www.netqin.com/en/products/에서 다운로드받을 수 있으며, 모든 안드로이드 버전은 안드로이드 마켓에서 구할 수 있다.
NetQin 소개
2005년에 설립되었으며 Sequoia, Mayfield, Fidelity 및 Ceyuan VC의 지원을 받는 NetQin Mobile Inc.(이하 “NetQin”)는 세계 굴지의 모바일 보안서비스업체로서, 전 세계 200개가 넘는 국가 및 지역에서 6백만 명이 넘는 사용자들에게 클라우드 컴퓨팅 모델(안티-바이러스, 안티-멀웨어, 안티-스팸, 프라이버시 보호, 데이터 백업 및 복구, 데이터 관리 등을 포함)을 바탕으로 하며 그 효과가 입증된 모바일 보안 솔루션을 제공함으로써, 이들을 모바일 보안 위협으로 보호한다. 모바일 보안 부문에서 시장 선두인 NetQin은 중국 모바일 보안 시장에서 64.8%의 점유율을 자랑하며(2010년 8월 발표된 Frost & Sullivan의 중국 모바일 보안 시장에 관한 2010 H1 백서), World Economic Forum의 기술 선구자 2011과 Frost & Sullivan의 모바일 보안 시장 리더십 상을 포함하여 수많은 업계상을 받았다.
추가 정보는 웹사이트 http://www.netqin.com/en에서 조회할 수 있다.
자료 제공: NetQin Mobile Inc.
NetQin Releases Holiday Edition of Products
AsiaNet 42676
(BEIJING, Dec. 22, 2010 AsiaNet=연합뉴스) NetQin Mobile Inc., a global leader in mobile security services, today announced the release of a Holiday line of mobile applications. Featured in the line is NetQin Mobile Anti-virus 4.2 Beta for Android, which was also updated with new features. With a holiday theme embedded in the products, the Holiday Edition of the products is designed as a way to bring the festive spirit, while still giving users an overall sense of security over the holiday season.
(Logo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20100215/CNM002LOGO)
NetQin Mobile Anti-virus 4.2 Beta for Android was updated with the latest technology to be able to track the device in its Anti-lost feature. The improved device location software can track CDMA devices accurately without the devices' GPS being on. Essentially, this prolongs the battery life, while also being able to more accurately locate the device.
The new and improved application also enhances the user interaction, providing an improved and simplified user interface, and more integrated user guides. Also, the real-time monitoring process and remote control features have also been optimized. The applications are now more efficient than before and with a small application footprint. This small footprint minimizes the impact on the devices' battery life. These new improvements make the application much more user-friendly overall.
The Holiday Edition of the products is also available on NetQin Mobile Manager and NetQin Mobile Guard on Android systems, and NetQin Mobile Anti-virus for Symbian. With the holiday season upon us, NetQin also advises users to keep all systems and virus databases up to date, to ensure full protection and security this holiday season.
All Holiday Editions of NetQin products are available for download at http://www.netqin.com/en/products/ and all Android versions are also available on the Android Market.
About NetQin
Founded in 2005, backed by Sequoia, Mayfield, Fidelity and Ceyuan VC, NetQin Mobile Inc. (referred to as "NetQin" hereafter) is a global leader in mobile security services, delivers proven mobile security solutions based on a cloud-computing model, including anti-virus, anti-malware, anti-spam, privacy protection, data backup and recovery, as well as data management - to more than 60 million users in more than 200 countries and regions worldwide - to protect them against mobile security threats. As the market leader in mobile security, NetQin holds 64.8% market share of China's mobile security market (2010 H1 Whitepaper on China Mobile Security Market by Frost & Sullivan, August 2010), and has received multiple industry awards and honors, including Technology Pioneer 2011 by the World Economic Forum, and the 2009 China Frost & Sullivan Award for Mobile Security Market Leadership.
For more information, please visit http://www.netqin.com/en.
SOURCE: NetQin Mobile Inc.
(베이징 2010년 12월 22일 AsiaNet=연합뉴스)

description.hltext_display: Japón crea un ratón cantarín
description.content:
Científicos japoneses de la Universidad de Osaka anunciaron ayer la creación de un ratón que canta como un pájaro, una “evolución” producto de la ingeniería genética. Para ello, usaron ratones genéticamente modificados propensos a las mutaciones.
“Las mutaciones son la fuerza motriz de la evolución. Hemos cruzado ratones genéticamente modificados por generaciones para ver qué pasaba,“ dijo el investigador, Arikuni Uchimura. “Un día encontramos un ratón que cantaba como un pájaro”, dijo, aclarando que el “ratón cantarín” nació por casualidad, pero ese rasgo se transmitirá a futuras generaciones.
Con el proyecto también se llegó a crear “un ratón con extremidades cortas y una cola como un perro salchicha”. El laboratorio cuenta con más de 100 “ratones cantarines” para futuras investigaciones.Científicos japoneses de la Universidad de Osaka anunciaron ayer la creación de un ratón que canta como un pájaro, una "evolución" producto de la ingeniería genética.

description.hltext_display: Fujairah Media launches ABC TV
description.content: Fujairah Media Group, the joint venture between the Fujairah Cultural Authority and Arab International Media Services, in collaboration with Mamoth Holdings, has announced that it has recently started broadcast of the newly launched ABC TV, a free-to-air, family-oriented TV channel that features Western and Arabic programming.

description.hltext_display: 图文：[中超]泰达昆明冬训 队员心情不错
description.content: 搜狐体育讯 北京时间12月22日上午，天津泰达队继续在昆明红塔基地进行冬训。在上午的体能训练课中，大部分时间被放在了力量房中进行，场地上的内容则更多地融入了游戏的成分，这让队员们心情不错，笑容时常挂在他们的脸上。外援方面，除留队继续观察的韩国外援李东元和保加利亚人科蒂夫之外，澳大利亚中场克洛维奇由于航班原因，暂时还在随队训练。图为训练精彩瞬间。（搜狐体育-吕忠怿/摄）

description.hltext_display: MetroPCS Launches LTE in Boston, NYC and Sac
description.content:
MetroPCS Communications has expanded its LTE network to the Boston, New York City and Sacramento metropolitan areas. MetroPCS LTE plans start at $55 per month including taxes and regulatory fees. Initially, METROPCS is providing Samsung Craft LTE handset with unlimited talk, text and enhanced entertainment and web browsing features.
MetroPCS 4G LTE services are now available in nine metropolitan areas, including Dallas-Fort Worth, Detroit, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, Philadelphia and San Francisco. MetroPCS has plans to expand its 4G services into more metropolitan areas later this year and into early 2011, including Atlanta, Jacksonville, Miami, Orlando and Tampa. description.hltext_display: [AsiaNet]��Ʈ��ũ �߸��� ������ ����ϴ� Sidak & Teece
description.content:
J. Gregory Sidak 교수와 David J. Teece 교수는 이번 주 미국연방통신위원회(Federal Communications Commission, FCC)가 채택할 것으로 예상되는 네트워크 중립성 규정의 기저가 되는 경제적 이유가 근본적으로 결함이 있다고 지적했다. 옥스퍼드대학 출판부(Oxford University Press, OUP)에서 출판하는 Journal of Competition Law & Economics에 실린 한 논문에서 Sidak 교수와 Teece 교수는 FCC가 제안하는 규정으로 인해 인터넷을 통한 개선된 패킷 제공을 위한 광대역 인터넷 서비스 제공업체(Internet service providers, ISPs)와 콘텐츠 제공업체 간의 선택적인 B2B 거래가 금지 혹은 제한될 수 있다고 설명했다. FCC가 제안한 “비차별” 규정은 비차별화된 최선형 전달이 제공하는 것보다 더 높은 품질(서비스 품질 혹은 QoS)의 인터넷 전송에 대한 더 높은 보안성 요구로 인해 차별화되는 모든 종류의 콘텐츠나 애플리케이션을 적극적으로 차별하는 모순된 결과를 낳을 수 있다. 그에 따라 더 높은 소비자 가격을 조장함으로써 정적인 효율성을 떨어뜨리는 것은 물론 혁신의 속도를 늦춤으로써 동적인 효율성도 떨어뜨릴 것이다.
논문 전문은 다음을 참조한다:
http://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=1593761.
J. Gregory Sidak은 워싱턴 DC에 위치한 Criterion Economics, L.L.C.(http://www.criterioneconomics.com)의 회장이며, 네덜란드 Tilburg University(TILEC)에서 법과 경제학을 가르치는 Ronald Coase 교수이다.
David J. Teece는 Berkeley Research Group LLC(http://www.brg-expert.com)의 회장 겸 최고경영자이며, 캘리포니아대학교 버클리 하스 비즈니스스쿨에서 국제경영을 가르치는 Thomas W. Tusher 교수이다.
두 교수 모두 국제적으로 저명한 반독점, 지적재산, 네트워크 산업 규정 및 복잡한 경제 소송 전문가들이다.
자료 제공: Criterion Economics, L.L.C.
연락처: Allison Crowley,
+1-202-518-5120,
acrowley@criterioneconomics.com
Sidak & Teece Debunk Net Neutrality Regulation
AsiaNet 42677
(WASHINGTON, Dec. 22, 2010 AsiaNet=연합뉴스) The economic reasoning underlying network neutrality regulation expected to be adopted this week by the Federal Communications Commission is fundamentally flawed, according to Professors J. Gregory Sidak and David J. Teece. In an article in the Journal of Competition Law & Economics, published by the Oxford University Press, Sidak and Teece explain that the FCC's proposed regulations would have the effect of banning or restricting optional business-to-business transactions between broadband Internet service providers (ISPs) and content providers for enhanced delivery of packets over the Internet. The proposed "nondiscrimination" rule would have the ironic effect of actively discriminating against any kind of content or application that is differentiated by its need for greater assurance of higher quality transmission across the Internet (known as quality of service, or QoS) than undifferentiated best-effort delivery can offer. This result not only would reduce static efficiency by encouraging higher consumer prices, but also would reduce dynamic efficiency by retarding innovation.
For text of the full article, please visit
http://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=1593761.
J. Gregory Sidak is the chairman of Criterion Economics, L.L.C. (http://www.criterioneconomics.com) in Washington, D.C. and the Ronald Coase Professor of Law and Economics at Tilburg University (TILEC) in The Netherlands.
David J. Teece is the chairman and Principal Executive Officer of the Berkeley Research Group LLC (http://www.brg-expert.com) and the Thomas W. Tusher Professor in Global Business at the Haas School of Business at the University of California, Berkeley.
Both are internationally recognized experts on antitrust, intellectual property, regulation of network industries, and complex economic litigation.
SOURCE: Criterion Economics, L.L.C.
CONTACT: Allison Crowley,
+1-202-518-5120,
acrowley@criterioneconomics.com
(워싱턴 2010년 12월 22일 AsiaNet=연합뉴스)

description.hltext_display: Nieve y lluvia aguan planes navideños en Europa y EE.UU.
description.content:
La nieve y unas temperaturas gélidas obligaron ayer a permanecer en tierra a centenares de vuelos en el norte de Europa, en medio del nerviosismo del sector minorista, preocupado por una temporada clave de compras a cuatro días de Navidad.
Eurocontrol, que gestiona el control del tráfico aéreo en 38 países, dijo que se esperaban más vuelos para ayer después de que el lunes se cancelaran unos 3.000 en el continente. “Las condiciones meteorológicas extremas siguen causando perturbaciones significativas a nuestras operaciones y lo harán en los días previos a la Navidad”, advirtió British Airways en un comunicado.
Miles de pasajeros están atrapados en el aeropuerto londinense de Heathrow desde hace días, ante el retraso y cancelación de vuelos.
Los analistas creen que el mal tiempo afectaría las ganancias de la aerolínea en unos 10 millones de libras diarias.
En cuanto al sector minorista, Andrew Wade, analista de Numis Securities, dijo que “la nieve en el país (Reino Unido) tiene unas consecuencias dramáticas, con unas ventas que han caído hasta un 50% en las zonas más afectadas”.
Alexon, una marca de ropa de mujer con unas 990 tiendas en Europa, advirtió de que sus ventas se han hundido un 20% en las últimas tres semanas.
El aeropuerto de Fráncfort reanudó su actividad después de permanecer cerrado durante varias horas la mañana de ayer. En Bélgica, el personal de mantenimiento consiguió líquido anticongelante, lo que permitió el despegue de algunos vuelos.
Eurostar dijo que su servicio iba a funcionar con restricciones debido al mal tiempo. En sus oficinas del centro de Londres se estaban formando largas colas de pasajeros.
“Estamos pidiendo a todos los clientes que van a viajar antes de Navidad que pidan la devolución o cambien sus billetes sin costo alguno si su viaje no es esencial”, dijo el operador del túnel ferroviario.
En Estados Unidos, mientras tanto, California se prepara para una Navidad bajo agua en medio de incesantes lluvias que obligaron a las autoridades a evacuar comunidades agrícolas y realizar rescates cerca de ríos, mientras se reparten bolsas de arena contra inundaciones, se abren refugios y se reportan apagones.
Equipos de bomberos ayudaron a la evacuación de habitantes de casas ubicadas en zonas de riesgo de derrumbes o inundaciones en los condados de Los Ángeles y San Bernardino.En las zonas británicas más afectadas las ventas cayeron un 50%. California lucha contra las aguas.

description.hltext_display: Undercover video raises questions about conditions at Tucson Greyhound Park
description.content:
Posted:
Updated:
Wednesday, December 22, 2010 1:22 AM EST
TUCSON (KOLD) - Since 1944, Tucsonans have been watching greyhounds race at Tucson Greyhound Park. But what you won't see and have never seen are where the dogs live, until now.
Undercover video shot earlier this year by non-profit animal welfare organization Grey2k has launched a heated debate on both sides.
"It is just plain wrong what is happening to greyhounds at Tucson Greyhound Park," says Christine Dorchak, founder of Grey2k. She says after learning about how race dogs really live, she put herself through law school just so she could put together legislation to put and end to dog racing everywhere.
"This is no way to treat a dog."
In the video, trainers show who they think are visitors through the process.
"These dogs are kept in total darkness all day long. They are let out a couple of times a day to relieve themselves in groups and then get right back in their cages."
"They live in confined cages barely large enough for them to stand up or turn around. Our investigators noted the majority of the dogs were muzzled inside their cages."
We took the video directly to Tucson Greyhound Park's CEO and general manager Tom Taylor.
Taylor says, 'They saw what they wanted to see."
Taylor says Tucson Greyhound Park is one of the best remaining racing facilities in the country. He calls the kennels an ideal place for dogs.
We asked, "Would you keep your dog like this?
Taylor said, "If it was a racing dog yes, if it was a pet no.
We asked, "What is the difference?"
Taylor answered, "One has a job and does a job and one doesn't. One has to stay in shape the other doesn't."
Some would argue, why not keep the dogs outside. Taylor answers, "They don't want to be outside."
But since voters passed a proposition in 2008 to protect the treatment of greyhounds at TGP, by law they must be outside for at least 6 hours a day. Taylor says that is the only part that isn't ideal at Tucson Greyhound Park and that even the dogs oppose it.
"They will be out there barking and scratching at the gate to get back inside," he says. "Trainers don't like it, owners don't want their dogs out 6 hours a day and the dogs don't want out 6 hours a day. But the law says we have to so we do it."
But it is hard to know if they do always do it, even by Taylor's own admission.
"We don't make sure. There is no way we can. They only way we can is if we had someone sitting in their everyday.
We asked, "Do you trust that it is happening?"
"They tell us they are doing it."
According to Taylor, trainers log their hours. We asked the Arizona Department of Racing for those logs and other information on inspections. They had 30 days to give us the public records but we never received them. Dorchak says that has happened to her as well.
"They are not going to change we need to make the change for them," she says. "I think if the public looks at the video documentation that we are providing to the public they will contact the agency and demand better treatment for the dogs."
But we wanted to see for ourselves.
Taylor says, "If you walk in there you may not see the same thing they saw."
We asked to see it, but Taylor declined.
"I am not going to let the press in because you are going to show it to thousands of people and we don't know how they are going to take it. It doesn't make any sense to do that Heather. I could show you the Taj Mahal and people would say that it is too religious."
We asked, "Can't we just let the people decide?"
Taylor responded, "No. They won't. They will agree with these people."
We asked, "If you have nothing to hide and are prideful then..."
Taylor said, "I could show you the Mona Lisa and you could say that is horrible."
At this point it is hard to tell what is exactly happening behind the gates. But one thing that can be publicly seen six days a week all year long are the greyhounds racing at Tucson Greyhound park.
©2010 KOLD. All rights reserved.

description.hltext_display: Chaney named to lead national group
图文：[中超]泰达昆明冬训 韩国外援李东元
description.content: 搜狐体育讯 北京时间12月22日上午，天津泰达队继续在昆明红塔基地进行冬训。在上午的体能训练课中，大部分时间被放在了力量房中进行，场地上的内容则更多地融入了游戏的成分，这让队员们心情不错，笑容时常挂在他们的脸上。外援方面，除留队继续观察的韩国外援李东元和保加利亚人科蒂夫之外，澳大利亚中场克洛维奇由于航班原因，暂时还在随队训练。图为训练精彩瞬间。（搜狐体育-吕忠怿/摄）

description.hltext_display: Antonio Valencia acudió a homenaje navideño para niños
description.content:
Eran las 11:40 cuando Antonio Valencia llegó a la cancha del estadio Carlos Vernaza de Lago Agrio. En aquel gramado donde siendo niño corría cargando las cosas que ayudaba a vender a su madre, ahora entró como una estrella.
Aproximadamente 200 niños de diferentes centros educativos del sector ya habían participado en el primer concurso de villancicos desde tempranas horas de ayer. El ganador fue el coro del tercer año de básica de la escuela Camilo Gallegos.
Todos lucieron muy felices cuando miraron a Valencia. Algunos por primer vez en su vida tenían tan cerca a una de las figuras del Manchester United de Inglaterra.
El ‘Toño’, con humildad, estrechó la mano de quienes se acercaron a él. Simplemente sonreía mientras cada vez más menores se le aproximaban.
La fiesta navideña también fue organizada para los chicos de la escuela de fútbol que tiene el nombre del extremo derecho del conjunto inglés y que fue auspiciado por el Municipio. Por ese motivo, lo invitaron para que entregue las cajas de regalos, las fundas de caramelos y las mochilas.
Los niños no pudieron mantener el orden y en varias oportunidades rompían filas para volver hacia donde estaba su ídolo. Valencia se emocionó cuando los niños le pidieron que juegue con la pelota. Ignoró el dolor que aún siente en el tobillo izquierdo por la fractura que sufrió el 14 de septiembre pasado durante la Liga de Campeones, hizo un par de cascaritas. Aunque, inmediatamente dejó el balón a un lado.
El alcalde de la ciudad, Yofre Poma, reconoció la trayectoria del seleccionado nacional y le entregó las Llaves de la Ciudad. Antonio agradeció el gesto y anunció que seguirá de cerca los proyectos que emprende el Municipio. Incluso, después del festejo que no duró mucho tiempo, el futbolista acudió hacia la oficina del alcalde y firmó un convenio de apoyo a la escuela de fútbol y a los demás proyectos culturales y deportivos que emprenderá el gobierno local en los próximos meses. Uno será darle más fuerza a la escuela de balompié.
Valencia no permanecerá en Lago Agrio. Regresará a Quito para continuar con su rehabilitación. La única condición que le puso el cuerpo médico del club para dejarle viajar al Ecuador es que no descuide su aspecto físico.
Dentro de doce días, el ex El Nacional, Villarreal, Recreativo y Wigan volverá a Inglaterra para someterse a nuevas revisiones médicas de rutina.Eran las 11:40 cuando Antonio Valencia llegó a la cancha del estadio Carlos Vernaza de Lago Agrio. En aquel gramado donde siendo niño corría cargando las cosas que ayudaba a vender a su madre.

description.hltext_display: 44.5% increase in Abu Dhabi International Airport's Duty Free revenues during F1 season
description.content: Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates: Abu Dhabi Airports Company (ADAC), operator of the Emirate of Abu Dhabi's five airports, announced a 44.5% increase in Duty Free revenues and a 16% increase in passengers at Abu Dhabi International Airport during the F1 season in November, compared to the period of last year's race.

description.hltext_display: S. Korea aims to attain 30 pct self-sufficiency in oil, gas by 2019
description.author: YONHAP
description.content: SEOUL, Dec. 22 (Yonhap) -- South Korea aims to attain 30 percent self-sufficiency for crude oil and natural gas by 2019 by pushing for greater overseas production of energy resources, the government said Wednesday. A basic development blueprint outlined by the Ministry of Knowledge Economy also calls for reducing foreign dependency on other critical natural resources such as lithium and rare earth elements that are vital for the production of high-tech information technology ...

description.hltext_display: Бобич: игроки "Штутгарта" осознают серьёзность ситуации
description.content: Немецкому "Штутгарту" сегодня предстоит матч 1/8 финала кубка Германии с мюнхенской "Баварией". Перед матчем руководство клуба и игроки команды пребывают в тревоге, так как не исключают очередной вспышки гнева со стороны болельщиков. Напомним, что после домашнего матча 17 тура национального первенства с мюнхенской "Баварией", проигранного хозяевами поля со счётом 3:5, разъярённые болельщики приблизились к VIP-ложе, где сидели президент и его сотрудники, и начали кричать на них. Они требовали от них подать в отставку и около часа не выпускали их оттуда. Президента и остальных вынуждены были защищать более 100 представителей правопорядка. "Перед матчем с "Баварией" многие игроки обеспокоены, так как понимают серьёзность сложившейся ситуации. Некоторые футболисты испытывают страх и не могут справиться с этим. Но все-таки хочется надеяться, что болельщики придут на матч с "Баварией" с соответствующим настроем", — сказал спортивный директор "Штутгарта" Фредди Бобич.

description.hltext_display: Nidec Establishes Sales Subsidiary in India
description.content:
Power Channels: Power Components
Nidec Corp. announced that it has established its first India-based sales subsidiary, Nidec India Private Limited, in Gurgaon, a city adjacent to India’s capital, New Delhi.
India ranks only behind China as the world’s second most populous country with 1.2 billion people and the second-fastest growing economy among the BRIC nations. An increasing demand for consumer goods, ranging from household appliances and automobiles to communications devices, is fostering the growth of India’s domestic businesses and attracting a major influx of Japanese and other foreign-capital companies. The new sales subsidiary aims to build solid business relationships with these prospective companies by quickly meeting their increasing needs for component products and services.

description.hltext_display: PhillyDeals: Why the United States can't audit its own budget
description.author: Joseph N. DiStefano
description.content:
The government's own auditors say they can't verify the accuracy of the budget of the United States, because the military, Medicare planners, and other big federal programs are doing such a poor job explaining what they do with the people's money.
This is at least the 10th consecutive year that the Government Accountability Office has found the federal budget un-auditable, spokeswoman Laura Kopelson told me.
In a statement, Acting Comptroller General Gene Dodaro cited "serious financial management problems at
the Department of Defense" and "significant uncertainties" over cuts to Medicare doctor reimbursements and other Medicare cost cuts.
He also blamed $125 billion in "improper payments," poor accounting of government payments to government agencies, and problems with "information security" and tax collection.
The worst accounting offenders were the Departments of Defense, Homeland Security, and Labor.
Not everyone's to blame. Some 19 of the 24 main U.S. agencies actually presented "clean" books, the GAO found.
For more information, check the fiscal year 2010 Financial Report of the United States Government, which includes the non-audit, at http://www.gao.gov/financial.html.
'Panic' in taxland "What's going on with tax policy in Washington right now seems crazy," writes ex-Inquirer and ex-New York Times tax reporter David Cay Johnston at Tax.com. "Crazy tax policies, crazy borrowing," and crazy neglect of the national infrastructure and reasonable policy that attracts domestic investment instead of punishing it, Johnston reports.
He lists a string of examples, from President Richard Nixon's efforts that made it easier for U.S. manufacturers to move to low-wage China, through President Obama's violation of his own campaign pledges to boost taxes for the rich. The richest Americans were spared by Obama cutting a deal with Republican Senate leaders, who call themselves budget-balancers. The deal forces the government to borrow tens of billions of dollars so it can cut taxes for the rich and most everyone else, driving the record deficit still higher.
Bad politics? Worse, says Johnston: "America is in the grip of a full-blown societal panic. Crazy, irrational, contradictory ideas about tax policy are just the most obvious symptom." The root cause is Americans' slow realization that the United States no longer dominates the world economy like it did after World War II.
Johnston says global competition, the eroding dollar, and heavy borrowing have been made worse by a generation of political attempts to pump up the financial markets and other services, instead of confronting these changes with steady federal investments and fair taxes. "The fear of what the new American economy means is killing reasoned debate about taxes, tax policy, and how to distribute the burdens of making our great nation function," Johnston concludes. "We will never get on a path to sound tax policy, policy that flows from the new economic order instead of against it, until enough of us stand back from the riotous conditions and find a place where rational debate about taxes can grow into popular understanding." He could add, there's also the need to find leaders strong enough to sell sensible programs.
Golf at your own risk Next time someone tells you the U.S. court system is out of control, consider this:
One day way back in 2002, Dr. Anoop Kapoor and his friend Dr. Azaz Anand went golfing on Long Island. "Without yelling 'Fore' or giving any other warning," according to court filings, "Kapoor 'shanked' a shot," hitting Anand in the left eye, knocking loose his retina and causing "permanent loss of vision." Anand sued Kapoor. Welcome to America! Decision, appeal, appeal, appeal.
Finally, Tuesday, New York's highest court ruled: "A person who chooses to participate in a sport or recreational activity consents to certain risks. Failure to warn of his intent to strike the ball did not amount to intentional or reckless conduct, and did not unreasonably increase the risks inherent in golf. . . . "Being hit without warning by a 'shanked' shot while one searches for one's own golf ball reflects a commonly appreciated risk." So no damages, and plaintiff pays costs.
And it only took eight ye

event_or_fact.property: global competition, the eroding dollar, and heavy borrowing have been made worse by a generation of political attempts to pump up the financial markets and other services, instead of confronting these changes with steady federal investments and fair taxes

description.hltext_display: WSU: US Department of Justice, Gates give grants to help child victims
Obama signing 'don't ask, don't tell' repeal
description.content:
WASHINGTON - Fulfilling a campaign pledge, cheering his party's downcast liberals and striking a blow for what he sees as basic human rights, President Barack Obama is signing a landmark law Wednesday that tells America's armed services to let homosexuals serve openly for the first time.
So many gay rights and Democratic activists were expected at the signing ceremony that the White House booked a large auditorium at the Interior Department.
"This day has come!" said an elated Mike Almy, an Air Force major discharged four years ago when his sexual orientation became known. "'Don't ask, don't tell' is over, and you no longer have to sacrifice your integrity."
While the elation is real, Pentagon officials caution it could be premature, since the bill requires service chiefs to complete implementation plans before lifting the old policy — and certify to lawmakers that it won't damage combat readiness, as critics charge.
Also, guidelines must be finalized that cover a host of practical questions, from how to educate troops to how sexual orientation should be handled in making barracks assignments.
While officials have avoided timetables, the process will probably take months.
Still, for gay and lesbian Americans, Wednesday is a watershed. And for Obama, it is a day to revel in the achievement of a goal he's long championed.
It is also the second of three expected victories in what's turned out to be — for Obama — a surprisingly productive lame-duck Congress. Weeks after his self-described "shellacking" in the midterm vote, he's won lopsided approval of a tax cut compromise, and the Senate is poised to deliver his top foreign policy goal: ratification of a new nuclear arms treaty with Russia.
Many Democratic liberals were furious over the tax package, believing Obama blithely yielded to Republican demands to retain the same tax cuts for the rich he had loudly denounced on the campaign trail. That's not the case with the repeal of don't ask, don't tell. Lifting of the ban on gays serving openly was something Obama not only campaigned on in 2008 but reiterated in this year's State of the Union speech.
"I will work with Congress and our military to finally repeal the law that denies gay Americans the right to serve the country they love because of who they are," he said in January to cheers in the House chamber, adding, "It's the right thing to do."
Born 17 years ago as a compromise between President Bill Clinton and a resistant Pentagon, the "don't ask, don't tell" policy became for gay rights campaigners a notorious roadblock on the way to full acceptance.
Speaking in June at a Gay Pride Month observance at the White House, Obama likened the fight to end it to the struggle of American blacks for civil rights.
"We have never been closer to ending this discriminatory policy," he declared.
Yet he has also faced rising discontent among gay activists who believed he hadn't moved forcefully enough. He's been heckled at campaign appearances over AIDS funding and the failure to end the military service ban.
Obama countered that as commander-in-chief, he had to ensure the ban's end is carefully prepared for.
That's just what the bill from Congress mandates.
"The implementation and certification process will not happen immediately; it will take time," Air Force Chief of Staff Gen. Norton Schwartz warned in an e-mail that went out right after Saturday's Senate vote. "Meanwhile, the current law remains in effect. All Air Force members should conduct themselves accordingly."
Military and administration officials are wrestling with numerous legal questions raised by the end of the ban — knowing that courts are waiting in the wings. They include what to do about pending expulsion proceedings, and when those ousted under don't-ask-don't-tell might apply to rejoin the armed forces.
For Almy, who appeared at a Capitol Hill ceremony Monday, the important thing is that gay and lesbian service members are no longer singled out because of who they love.
"That's all we ever wanted," he told reporters, "not special rights, just the same as our straight counterparts. "

event_or_fact.property: I will work with Congress and our military to finally repeal the law that denies gay Americans the right to serve the country they love because of who they are
This day has come!; Don't ask, don't tell
The implementation and certification process will not happen immediately; it will take time; Meanwhile, the current law remains in effect. All Air Force members should conduct themselves accordingly.
to let homosexuals serve openly for the first time

description.hltext_display: Storbanker: Vi står utan skuld
description.author: Tomas.Hedlund
description.content:
De australiska bankerna The Commonwealth Bank, CBA, Macquarie Bank och Bank of Queensland förnekar kraftigt delaktighet i den australiska finanskrisen.Australian Securities and Investments Commission, ASIC, hävdar att bankerna är djupt delaktiga i den australiska finanskrisen, som startade med att företaget Storm kraschade och inte uppfyller kraven som ställs på dem gällande australiska värdepapper. 14 000 investerare har förlorat tre miljarder australiska dollar, 20,4 miljarder kronor, i företagskollapser.
ASIC drar bankerna inför rätta på uppdrag av investerare som hävdar brott mot banklagen och orimligt beteende. ASIC för en grupptalan gentemot bankerna i flera mål i australiska domstolar.
Bankerna försvarar sina besluta att godkänna så kallade marginallån i Stormaffären som härleder till 2003. Bankerna beskriver ASIC:s verksamhet som ohållbar och spekulativ.
- Vi har agerat etiskt, lagligt och professionellt, säger banken Macquarie i ett uttalande.
CBA riktar även de kritik mot ASIC, samtidigt som de bekräftar ett en grupptalan inletts mot banken.
- Vi håller inte med ASIC:s syn på hur bankernas roll varit i Stormaffären, säger CBA i ett officiellt uttalande.

description.hltext_display: En enero el proyecto de Ley de Comunicación volverá al Pleno
description.content:
Con andar pausado, Mauro Andino transita por los pasillos del Legislativo. En su mano derecha lleva una carpeta que guarda una de sus más grandes preocupaciones: el proyecto de Ley de Comunicación. La norma lleva más de un año en trámite y el Ejecutivo ha anunciado que podría someterla a consulta. Sin embargo, en la Asamblea se busca desbloquearla y aprobarla.
¿Para cuándo irá a segundo debate el proyecto de Ley de Comunicación?
El bloque de PAIS decidió anoche (lunes 20) que sea debatido en enero próximo. Hace tiempo, yo había pedido que el tema continúe su trámite y ahora la bancada aceptó.
El sábado, el presidente Rafael Correa dijo que el tema podría ir a consulta popular. ¿El Ejecutivo impulsa esta propuesta sin tener en cuenta lo que los legisladores van a hacer?
Son dos acciones diferentes que deberían evacuarse por cuerdas separadas. El Presidente tiene la facultad de consultar cualquier tema que considere de trascendencia. Pero eso no quiere decir que -como Asamblea- debamos suspender el tratamiento del proyecto; este o cualquier otro. Hacer lo contrario sería irrespetar la independencia de las funciones del Estado. Creo que el Presidente no quiere eso.
¿Va a producirse un cortocircuito entre las dos funciones?
El Presidente ha hecho un anuncio. Eso es solo una posibilidad, tampoco es un hecho.
¿Pero tampoco ha tratado ese tema con el bloque?
De ninguna manera se ha tratado eso con el Presidente. Para mí, la Ley de Comunicación es un tema técnico y jurídico que debe seguir tramitándose.
Usted lo ha dicho: es un tema técnico, jurídico y complejo. ¿Cómo se puede resumir un tema así en una consulta?
Es un tema técnico-jurídico y el Presidente de la República tendría que analizar si es o no viable consultar ese tema.
¿Para qué ha servido este intervalo entre el primer debate del proyecto y el plazo en el que se prevé el segundo debate?
No hemos suspendido a propósito. Hemos dado paso a otras leyes y el tiempo no nos ha permitido tratar Comunicación. Aunque, como ponente de la ley, me he reunido con grupos como el Colegio de Periodistas de Pichincha, la UNP del Guayas, el Defensor del Pueblo y la Relatoría de las Naciones Unidas. He conversado con algunos asambleístas intentando llegar a acuerdos que garanticen las libertades de información.
¿En qué sentido se están construyendo los acuerdos?
Hay sugerencias de la Relatoría que si podrán ser recogidas.
¿Cómo cuáles?
Por ejemplo, el artículo que habla de la información veraz puede ser quitado porque ya está en la Constitución. También podría reducirse, de dos a uno, los representantes del Ejecutivo ante el Consejo de Comunicación. Tampoco serían dos de la ciudadanía sino tres, más uno de las facultades de Comunicación y otro de los Consejos de Igualdad. También hay que analizar las facultades del Consejo para que no estén contra la Constitución o los tratados internacionales.
¿En cuáles otros temas habrá apertura para armonizar el texto con los otros grupos políticos?
Se ha cuestionado sobre las facultades que se le ha dado a la Defensoría y veo que sí sería duplicarlas porque ya constan en la Constitución. Otro punto es las frecuencias. Hay que analizar si una persona natural o jurídica solo podrá tener una licencia de un canal nacional o local. Y de una radio nacional y local. Eso para evitar la concentración.
¿El Consejo tendrá facultades en Telecomunicaciones?
Se comenta que en el Ejecutivo están trabajando en un proyecto de Telecomunicaciones. En el bloque esperamos que ese sea compatible con el de Comunicación. Esperamos que no haya un choque ni contraposición porque eso sí sería sumamente grave.
¿Cómo crecerán las radios si no hay opción a ampliarse?
Eso se debatirá en el segundo debate. Si la mayoría va por un cambio habrá apertura.
Una de las cosas que preocupa de las concesiones es el tiempo. Si no hay tiempo, no habrá inversiones ni buena radio.
En el informe está contemplado por diez años y puede renovarse bajo el cumplimiento de requisitos. En eso no hay problema.
¿Qué decisión hay sobre la profesionalización de periodistas?
Es un tema polémico. Incluso, la Relatoría de las Naciones Unidas hizo referencia a ello. Vamos a analizar porque hay posiciones encontradas. El Colegio de Periodistas tiene un criterio y la UNP, otro. Pero habrá que analizarlo con el fin de cumplir una resolución de la Corte Interamericana de Derechos Humanos.
Es decir ¿que no se exija la profesionalización?
Es probable pero también hay preocupación sobre lo que pasa con las facultades de Comunicación y con quienes se están preparando para ser periodistas.
Hay una salida. Que sigan en lo suyo y los medios también. Es más fácil enseñar periodismo a un economista que viceversa...
Habrá que analizarlo seriamente para no ir en contra de la resolución de la Corte y, peor aún, violentar algún derecho.
¿En enero habrá las condiciones políticas para aprobar la ley?
Aspiro a que las haya una vez que entremos al debate. Luego habrá tiempo para acoger sugerencias, llegar a consensos, someter a votación el texto y esperamos que haya más de 63 votos.
¿Cree que la ley abarque los consensos suficientes que impidan que sea impugnada fuera o dentro del país?
Esa es mi aspiración. No queremos que en cualquier momento se pueda presentar una demanda de inconstitucionalidad o una demanda ante organismos internacionales.Mauro Andino / Presidente de la Comisión de Comunicación

description.hltext_display: Deux TER contrôlés par surprise pour retrouver des stupéfiants et des clandestins
description.content: Dix fonctionnaires, autant de la brigade de Narbonne des douanes que de la police aux frontières de Port-la-Nouvelle, ont uni leurs efforts, hier après-midi, pour passer deux trains au peigne fin. Un TER au départ de Narbonne et à destination de Castelnaudary, puis un train reliant Castelnaudary à Montpellier.Chacun avait un objectif précis. Les douaniers recherchaient en priorité des stupéfiants, notamment les grands classiques : le cannabis en provenance dEspagne et des amphétamines arrivant du nord de lEurope par le TGV Bruxelles-Perpignan.La Paf contrôlait, de son côté, des voyageurs étrangers afin de vérifier leur situation administrative. Les policiers sont passés experts pour détecter les faux papiers. Même si quelque fois cest assez difficile.« Narbonne, cest le carrefour de lEurope du sud. Forcément, la majorité des personnes en situation irrégulière arrivant dEspagne et dItalie passe par-là », indique le major Jean-Pierre Zucchetto de la Paf.Ainsi, cette année, 250 étrangers en situation irrégulière ont été interpellés par la Paf de lAude et 170 ont fait lobjet dune reconduite à la frontière, après un passage par un des trois centres de rétention de la région : Nîmes, Toulouse ou Sète.Du côté des douaniers, les prises de stupéfiants sont régulières. Une trentaine de kilos de résine de cannabis en moyenne en 2009 et autant en 2010. Plus 800 g de cocaïne en 2009. Mais la moyenne peut être complètement bouleversée avec une saisie record.Le commandant Christophe Payret, responsable des brigades audoises, attend avec impatience larrivée en janvier dun deuxième chien spécialement dressé pour repérer les stupéfiants.Lopération dhier a permis linterpellation dune ressortissante colombienne dont le passeport ne serait pas en règle. Elle a été prise en charge par la Paf de lHérault en gare de Montpellier. Sid MOKHTARI

description.hltext_display: Diaporama : on fond pour Isabelle CarrÃ©
description.content:
Dans Les émotifs anonymes, sur nos écrans cette semaine, la petite nymphe du cinéma français Isabelle Carré joue la timide face à un Benoît Poelvoorde peu dégourdi. Tout ça sur fond de chocolat ! Portrait en images de la demoiselle.
Elle a débuté en incarnant la fille de Daniel Auteuil (Romuald et Juliette), a roulé sa bosse sur les planches (une de ses plus grandes passions, avec Romy Schneider), a obtenu 2 Molières et a été consacrée Espoir aux Césars grâce au Hussard sur le toit....
Isabelle Carré a l'élégance d'une actrice travailleuse, discrète mais pétillante. Elle a interprété de nombreux seconds rôles, montrant l'étendue de son jeu, tout en nuances. Tantôt femme esseulée, tantôt hystérique, tantôt provocatrice, on a l'impression que tout lui va. Son plus beau personnage est peut-être celui de la femme sans mémoire du film Se souvenir des belles choses, première réalisation de Zabou Breitman, qu'elle interprète aux côtés de Bernard Campan, tout aussi touchant, et qui lui vaudra un César.
Depuis, la belle suit son chemin, alternant cinéma d'auteur et productions plus fortunées, traçant lentement mais sûrement un joli chemin vers les étoiles du 7ème art français. Petite visite guidée en images dans le carré de fraîcheur d'Isabelle.

description.hltext_display: Finnair "pimpar" sina flygplan
description.author: malin.carlehall
description.content:
Under 2013 är Finnairs nya designkoncept helt genomfört. Samtliga av Finnairs flygplan ska då ha målats om i den nya vita färgen "Cherry Blossom" och prytts med den nya mörkblå loggan designad av Esa Lipiänen. Det är inte bara utsidan på planen som får sig en rejäl renovering, även på insidan kommer det att ske designmässiga förändringar.
- Finnair är i dag Europas tredje största aktör till och från Asien. Finland är inte längre vår största marknad. Det är Japan. Vår tillväxt i framtiden kommer att ske via trafiken mellan Europa och Asien med Helsingfors som nav. Den rakaste och snabbaste vägen. Därför måste vi kunna erbjuda en produkt av högsta internationella klass, säger Finnairs koncernchef Mika Vehviläinen i ett pressmeddelande.
Omprofileringen har kostat flygbolaget 100 miljoner kronor. Under 2012 blir även kabinpersonalen och piloterna uppgraderade med nya uniformer, ritade av Ritva-Liisa Pohjalainen som är en av Finlands mest kända designers.

description.hltext_display: Chisora Could Be Big Winner in Klitschko-Haye Dispute
description.author: Terence Dooley
description.content:
By Terence Dooley
Derek Chisora recently voiced his frustrations to BoxingScene.com in the wake of the postponement, and possible cancellation, of his heavyweight world title showdown with Wlad Klitschko. ‘Del Boy’, however, may take heart from the latest twist in the Haye-Klitschko saga, as the Londoner is still in line for a surprise shot at Wladimir should a Haye showdown fall apart.
Indeed, Haye has admitted that his understudy may yet benefit if a WBA, IBO, IBF and WBO title fight isn’t agreed by mid-January. “Chisora is at their mercy, if they want to fight him they will, if they want me they'll fight me – it's up to them,” reiterated Haye during his recent BBC interview.
Chisora is 14-0 (9); he came into contention due to his British and Commonwealth title wins over Danny Williams and Sam Sexton, the initial match up was derided, especially in light of Wlad’s dismissal of Audley Harrison’s world title credentials ahead of Haye’s WBA title defence against ‘A-Force’.
Come what may, the heavyweight picture should be slightly clearer by the end of January.
Please send news and views to neckodeemus@hotmail.co.uk

description.hltext_display: Gobierno dio 14 frecuencias a comunidades indígenas
description.content:
Gracias por ayudarnos a mejorar nuestro contenido. Sus datos no serán publicados.
Nombres:
Email:
Motivo:
Rectificación
Radios
Gobierno dio 14 frecuencias a comunidades indígenas
El Gobierno suscribió ayer, un acuerdo para entregar catorce frecuencias de radio a igual número de comunidades indígenas, en el marco de un programa de emisoras populares.
37 lecturas
0 comentarios
Calificación:
El Gobierno suscribió ayer, un acuerdo para entregar catorce frecuencias de radio a igual número de comunidades indígenas, en el marco de un programa de emisoras populares que prevé extender a otros 200 grupos aborígenes.
La secretaria de Pueblos, Alexandra Ocles, durante la firma del convenio indicó que se ha efectuado una inversión de “600.000 dólares, aproximadamente”, para entregar los equipos de emisión a las comunidades beneficiadas.
Según Ocles, a mediados de 2011 las emisoras, cuyas frecuencias y equipos fueron entregadas hoy, “saldrán al aire”, con programaciones que las propias comunidades elaborarán. Las autoridades también han emprendido un plan de capacitación a los miembros de los grupos indígenas que administrarán y producirán en las emisoras.

description.hltext_display: 国足热身只为“瘦身” 迎战马其顿目的考核队员
description.content:
本报讯（特约记者王帆）热身赛是小事，国足定下最后的亚洲杯名单才是大事。
今晚，国足将在广州越秀山体育场迎战马其顿，这是国足出征亚洲杯前的最后一场热身赛，也是主教练高洪波为亚洲杯名单考核队员的最后机会。
如果加上“海归”冯潇霆、蒿俊闵,国足的阵容达到30人,而这其中只有23人可以跟随高洪波飞赴卡塔尔征战亚洲杯。
出征在即，最终的23人名单也将揭晓，这也是外界最为关注的事情。目前，两名海归球员中，冯潇霆因伤确定无缘亚洲杯、蒿俊闵归期未定，加上队伍这段时间来一直伤号不断，上一场对阵爱沙尼亚的比赛中，门将曾城又受伤了，这势必会对最终的大名单造成影响。
据悉，参加亚洲杯的名单大框架已基本确定，主帅高洪波心中的最终名单将最晚会在27日揭晓。
今晚的比赛后，国足将会继续留在广东备战。根据队伍的安排，球员们会在今天的比赛后放假一天，进行调整，然后继续演练技战术，但是不会再安排热身赛。
据记者了解，由于国足希望能在亚洲杯之前和伊拉克进行一场热身赛，因此球队决定在亚洲杯正式开打之前一周抵达卡塔尔。12月31日跨年夜，高家军将正式兵发卡塔尔多哈。
法晚播报
CCTV519：30
2010年国际足球友谊赛中国VS马其顿

description.hltext_display: Friends come to aid of former UI basketball player
When Bollywood actors went de-glam and geeky
description.content:
New Delhi - Glamorous looks and designer outfits have been synonymous with Bollywood, but 2010 saw a lot of mainstream stars going de-glam. From Bipasha Basu and Aishwarya Rai to John Abraham and Akshay Kumar, few shied away from experimenting with their on-screen appearance.
"Actors are not shying away from experimenting and they are willing to shed those extra kilos of jewellery, designer outfits and make-up to get into character," trade analyst Taran Adarsh told IANS.
"Moreover, since the storylines are getting real, audiences also look for real characters they can connect with. They have started accepting actors in plain looks," he added.
The otherwise bold and sensual Bipasha opted for a no make-up look in two of her films, "Aakrosh" and "Lamhaa". While "Lamhaa" saw her playing a simple Kashmiri girl, in "Aakrosh" she played the role of a tortured wife.
Akshay Kumar played a struggling road contractor in "Khatta Meetha". With his shirt buttoned up to the collar, oily hair, and a small pouch and umbrella in hand, Akshay immersed himself in the character of the common man.
John Abraham also turned geek for Abbas Tyrewala's "Jhoota Hi Sahi". But the actor admitted he was unsure whether he would be able to carry it off.
"When Abbas spoke to me about the character, I was not worried about the way I would look because I think the look completely befitted the character...I was worried about whether I would be able to carry off the look," John said.
The glamorous Katrina Kaif broke the mould by going completely de-glam for her role as a politician in Prakash Jha's "Rajneeti". Her simply tied hair and subdued saris proved to be as popular with the audiences as her fashionable looks.
Vidya Balan oozed sensuality in her bold village girl avatar in Vishal Bharadwaj's "Ishqiya". Aishwarya Rai too sported a no-make up look for ManiRatnam's "Raavan". Minissha Lamba went plain for her role in Shyam Benegal's National Award-winning film "Well Done Abba".
Deepika Padukone's plain appearance in Ashutosh Gowariker's "Khelein Hum Jee Jaan Sey" has already become a rage. Neha Dhupia also sported a no-make-up look in "Phas Gaye Re Obama", where she played the role of a woman gangster.
"Glamour no longer remains the key thing. Young actors have also started realising that success comes from real and entertaining films," Habib Faisal, director of the lighthearted film "Do Dooni Chaar", told IANS.
"Do Dooni Chaar" saw the real life couple Rishi Kapoor and Neetu Kapoor coming together on screen after 30 years.
"Filmmakers are trying to be true to the demographics and the material of the story. So if it requires the actors to go de-glam, they are game for it. The directors want to tell the story honestly and not create false glamour," he added.
The evergreen yet glamorous couple dressed down for their role of a typical middle class husband and wife in the film. Faisal said the crew went shopping in Lajpat Nagar and also went to roadside vendors to pick their clothes.
Yesteryear diva Dimple Kapadia made a comeback with Kabir Sadanand's "Tum Milo Toh Sahi", where she played a simple Parsi lady wearing frocks, skirts and shirts with glasses.
"Dimple Kapadia has always been known for her flowing hair and glamorous looks. In my film, I wanted to highlight her as a human being and not someone glamorous. It was a risk in its own way considering her image, but we are happy that our efforts paid off," said Sadanand.
"When I told her that this is going to be her look, there were no apprehensions and she was really happy. We picked up a lot of her clothes from street shops," he added.

description.hltext_display: Koruna mírně zpevnila, uvítala zažehnání rizika rozpadu vlády
description.content:
Praha - Česká měna dnes mírně posílila vůči euru i dolaru. Poté, co Věci veřejné potvrdily, že vládu premiéra Petra Nečase (ODS) ve sněmovně podpoří, zpevnila koruna pod 25,20 Kč za euro, nakonec však proti pondělnímu závěru končila jen o dva haléře silnější na 25,22 Kč/EUR. Vůči dolaru si připsala pět haléřů na 19,23 Kč/USD, vyplývá z informací serveru Patria Online.
"Koruna se ráno držela pondělních úrovní, odpoledne pak posílila pod 25,20 koruny za euro, když uvítala zažehnání rizika rozpadu vlády," uvedl Tomáš Vlk z Patria Finance. Poznamenal, že dohoda před dnešním sněmovním hlasováním o nedůvěře pomohla trh uklidnit, zisky však koruna neudržela a před závěrem oslabila.
"Růst hlavních akciových trhů na kurz neměl velký vliv," podotkl Vlk. Maďarský forint a polský zlotý se snažily během dne posilovat, před závěrem ale obrátily podobně jako koruna. Zatímco zlotý podle Vlka část zisků drží, forint končí ještě slabší než v pondělí.
Na kurz eura vůči dolaru nepůsobila žádná nová data. "Americká měna je proti euru mírně silnější než ráno, když se obchoduje na 1,3130 USD/EUR," uvedl Vlk. Negativní pro společnou evropskou měnu podle něj byla zpráva agentury Moody´s naznačující možné snížení portugalského ratingu. Během dne pak euru přechodně pomohl komentář čínského vicepremiéra, podle něhož Čína podporuje snahu členů eurozóny o snižování deficitů, dodal Vlk.

description.hltext_display: Un ouvrier de 60 ans chute et se tue
description.content: Hier matin, à 11 h 15, un homme âgé de 60 ans, originaire de lHérault et employé par une société narbonnaise du bâtiment, a été victime dun accident mortel du travail.Louvrier travaillait sur un échafaudage du chantier de lenseigne Conforama, sur la zone industrielle de la Féraudière, quand une rafale de vent a soulevé une tôle dacier qui la entraîné dans une chute fatale.Les policiers du commissariat de Carcassonne se sont rendus sur place et ont débuté une enquête sur cet accident du travail pour savoir si toutes les mesures de sécurité avaient été prises.

description.hltext_display: Qantas flyger med Airbus igen
description.author: daniel.nilsson-padilla
description.content:
Efter allt strul med A380 med bland annat en motorexplosion - som Newzglobe tidigare berättat om - kommer nu Qantas Airways Ltd att ha fem stycken A380 i luften före jul.Relaterade nyheter Det australiensiska flygbolaget gjorde tillkännagivandet i sin trafikrapport, som släpptes på onsdagen.
Nästa prioritet för Qantas är att återuppta A380 till London via Singapore från Melbourne, uppgav en talesman för Qantas, skriver Sky News.
Qantas trafiksiffror i den nya månadsrapporten ökade med 8.6 procent jämfört med samma period ett år tidigare.

description.hltext_display: 国足战马其顿重点考察替补 亚洲杯大名单将出炉
description.content:
今天晚上，中国国家队将在广州迎战马其顿队。对于这场比赛，主教练高洪波明确表示，“球队从体能训练转到技战术训练后，队员们的球感有些陌生，热身赛主要还是为了调整队员们的身体状态，同时就是教练组还想观察一下队员，尽快确定亚洲杯参赛名单。”
赛事组织有点马虎
高家军终极目标是杀入巴西世界杯，主教练高洪波工作重点也围绕世界杯预选赛展开，这些都注定亚洲杯赛事处于一个非常尴尬的地位。备战亚洲杯，国足热身赛组织就非常混乱，与马其顿队的比赛地点原来定在佛山世纪莲体育场，可是由于审核方面问题，佛山无法承办，赛地又被放到广州，变化给高家军带来了极大不便。热身在广州，训练在东莞，赛前发布会在佛山，国足竟然在三个地方游走备战。更为重要的是，原本计划的第三场热身赛由于印尼队爽约也宣布泡汤。
不仅如此，国足热身对手实力也非常孱弱，爱沙尼亚队没有派出最强阵容，马其顿队成色也明显不足，数名效力意大利联赛的球员缺席，而且过去和中国队两次比赛，结果为1平1负。可以说，这两场热身赛对于国足提升技战术，磨合打法并无实际意义。今天晚上对阵马其顿，国足只要正常发挥就应该能够获胜。
主力阵容基本确立
亚洲杯迫在眉睫，虽然还没有公布最终的参赛名单，但是经过前段时间集训以及与爱沙尼亚队的热身赛，国足主力阵容已经浮出水面。
在门将上，杨智状态沉稳将占据主力。后卫线，杜威卡位果断，在李玮锋无缘回归的大背景下，将会成为后防核心。左后卫荣昊有着超强的体能和奇快的速度，也肯定锁定主力位置。与两个绝对主力相比，张琳?位置似乎并不牢固，但他却有着非常好的发展前景，再加上右后卫难以选出真正无可争议的人选，因此主教练很可能倾向使用张琳?。另一个位置将从赵鹏和冯潇霆之间产生，冯潇霆希望要更大一些。
中场方面，主力框架也已经确定。邓卓翔是目前无可争议的核心，曲波和于海的位置也非常稳固，杨昊在后腰上同样能够站稳脚跟。另一个后腰，赵旭日是首选，不过他却要面对申花队长于涛强有力的竞争。前锋线，韩鹏伤退，郜林肯定担当主力。
重点考察替补队员
主教练高洪波对主力阵容心里已经有底，这场与马其顿的比赛更大程度上是考察替补队员，也就是说，边缘球员要想搭上亚洲杯的末班车就必须在今晚有上佳表现。
为了准备亚洲杯，国家队已经向亚足联上报了一份50人的大名单，在韩鹏、冯仁亮等伤兵离队后，又补充了于大宝等个别球员。按照亚足联规定，参赛的23人名单要在开赛前上报，上报的这份名单不得随意进行更改。足协计划是在中马热身之后确定23人名单，不过为了应付可能出现的伤病问题，正式名单之外还会额外再带上2到3名球员随队出征。据了解，国足与马其顿热身完将休息3天，于25日在广州集中，并集训至31日飞赴多哈。
记者 王瑞
直播提示
今日19：25
CCTV-5

description.hltext_display: Diaporama : Ben Stiller en 10 films !
description.content:
Un, deux et trois Furniquer ! Ben Stiller rempile dans le rôle de Greg Furniker aux côtés de Robert De Niro pour le 3ème volet des aventures du gendre et du beau-papa méfiant, Mon Beau-père et nous. Mais qu'est-ce qui fait courir Ben ? L'humour bien sûr. Diapo !
S'il est un genre que Ben Stiller maîtrise à merveille, c'est bien celui-ci : la déconnade. Hissé au rang de star grâce à sa performance d'amoureux transi dans le déjanté Mary à tout prix (1998) des frères Farrelly, l'acteur (mais aussi réalisateur, producteur et humoriste) Ben Stiller est devenu un symbole du comique américain un peu nanar ! Sa création de personnages grotesques ou tout simplement maladroits ou malchanceux font hurler de rire des millions de gens.
Et comme en période de Noël, on a bien envie de se marrer, nous à la rédac, on vous propose un retour en images sur les plus beaux rôles, signé Stiller.
Cliquez sur Diaporama en haut à droite et Joyeux Noël !

description.hltext_display: Bus destruye 2 casas y hiere a tres personas
description.content:
A la 01:00 de ayer un bus de la cooperativa CICA se estrelló contra dos viviendas en el barrio 24 de Mayo del cantón La Libertad, en Santa Elena. El estruendo despertó a los vecinos, quienes detuvieron al conductor el que, según dijeron, manejaba en estado etílico.
“Fue algo terrible, como un terremoto, todos salimos fuera de nuestras casas”, manifestó Bruno Carrasco, morador.
En uno de los inmuebles afectados dormían los ancianos Kléber Tigrero y Reina Reyes y su nieto menor de edad, quienes resultaron heridos y fueron trasladados a una casa de salud. La propietaria de la otra vivienda, Sonia Tigrero y su hijo Frank, de 8 años de edad, resultaron ilesos.
“A mi abuelita le cayó parte de la pared en su cuerpo, tiene heridas en el cráneo y en la cara. Ella es la que está más grave, gracias a Dios los otros heridos están estables e inclusive el niño que lo rescatamos debajo del carro” comentó, Juan Carlos Ramírez, nieto de los octogenarios.
Dirigentes de la cooperativa señalaron que el vehículo era conducido por el oficial, quien “arbitrariamente” lo habría sacado del estacionamiento.A la 01:00 de ayer un bus de la cooperativa CICA se estrelló contra dos viviendas en el barrio 24 de Mayo del cantón La Libertad, en Santa Elena. El estruendo despertó a los vecinos, quienes detuvie
